ye shes grub gyur nas/ /'jig rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid shog /de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen pa mchog ldan pas/ /nyon mongs bag chags dag ni rab tu spangs/ /bdag kyang de 'dra'i
ye shes grub gyur nas/ /'jig rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid shog /de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen pa mchog ldan pas/ /'khor ba nges 'byung chos ni rab tu mkhyen/ /bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes
grub gyur nas/ /'jig rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid shog /de bzhin gshegs pa chos don rab mkhyen pas/ /sems can dpag med rnams ni go bar mdzad/ /bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub
gyur nas/ /'jig rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid shog /de bzhin gshegs pas chos nyid sgyu ma dang / /rmi lam smig rgyu lta bur rab tu mkhyen/ /bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas/ /'jig
rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid shog /de bzhin gshegs pas 'jig rten thams cad kyi/ /yi ge dag dang brjod pa rab tu mkhyen/ /bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas/ /'jig rten thams cad
la ni phan bgyid shog /de bzhin gshegs pa spobs pa mchog ldan pas/ /dam chos zab mo dag ni ston par mdzad/ /bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas/ /'jig rten thams cad la
ni phan bgyid shog /de bzhin gshegs pa sku gsung thugs dul bas/ /thams cad ye shes rjes su 'brang bar mdzad/ /bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas/ /'jig rten thams cad la ni phan
bgyid shog /de bzhin gshegs pas dus gsum rab mkhyen pas/ /'dzin dang chags pa mi mnga' thogs mi mnga'/ /bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas/ /'jig rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid shog /
de bzhin gshegs pas tshul khrims ting 'dzin dang / /shes rab bsgrubs pas de la ldog mi 'gyur/ /bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas/ /khams gsum thugs rje chen po'i gtsor gyur
cig /de bzhin gshegs pas rnam grol rab bsgrubs pas/ /rnam grol mkhyen dang gzigs pa ldog mi mnga'/ /bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas/ /khams gsum thugs rje
chen po'i gtsor gyur cig /de bzhin gshegs pas zhi gnas lhag mthong bsgrubs/ /lha mi 'jig rten dag na mtshungs ma mchis/ /bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas/ /khams
gsum thugs rje chen po'i gtsor gyur cig /de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen pa mchog ldan pas/ /'jig rten chos rnams la ni zhen mi mnga'/ /bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas/ /khams
gsum thugs rje chen po'i gtsor gyur cig /de bzhin gshegs pas 'jig rten mkhyen ldan pas/ /'gro ba sna tshogs dag ni gsal bar gzigs/ /bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub
gyur nas/ /'gro ba de la the tshom ma mchis shog /de bzhin gshegs pa skye zad mtha' mkhyen pas/ /de slad de la rmongs pa yong mi mnga'/ /bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas/ /skye zad nyid
la the tshom ma mchis shog /de bzhin gshegs pas rab zhi mtha' mkhyen pas/ /de slad de la rmongs pa yong mi mnga'/ /bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas/ /rab zhi de la the tshom ma mchis
shog /de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor ba'i mtha' mkhyen pas/ /de slad de la rmongs pa yong mi mnga'/ /bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas/ /'khor ba de la the tshom ma mchis shog /de bzhin
gshegs pas sngon dang phyi mtha' mkhyen/ /de slad slob dpon ma mchis mkhyen dang ldan/ /bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas/ /snga phyi'i mtha' la the tshom ma mchis shog /de bzhin gshegs
pas skyon zlog mtha' rab mkhyen/ /de slad slob dpon ma mchis mkhyen dang ldan/ /bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas/ /skyon zlog de la the tshom ma mchis shog /de bzhin gshegs pas sngon

dang phyi mtha' mkhyen/ /mig gi rtag chad dag la 'dzin mi mnga'/ /bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas/ /snga phyi mtha' la the tshom ma mchis shog /de bzhin gshegs pas skye zad mtha' mkhyen pas/ /
mig gi rtag chad dag las 'dzin mi mnga'/ /bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas/ /skye zad nyid la the tshom ma mchis shog /gang zhig sngon dang phyi mtha' ma rtogs pas/ /des ni 'dod pa dag
la zhen pa skyed/ /de bzhin gshegs pas de ni rab mkhyen pas/ /de slad 'dod pa dag la zhen mi mnga'/ /gang zhig yod med mtha' ni ma rtogs pa/ /des ni 'dod pa dag la zhen pa skyed/ /de bzhin
gshegs pas de ni rab mkhyen pas/ /de slad 'dod pa dag la zhen mi mnga'/ /gang zhig zad dang mi zad ma rtogs pa/ /des ni 'dod pa dag la zhen pa skyed/ /de bzhin gshegs pas de ni rab mkhyen
pas/ /de slad 'dod pa dag la zhen mi mnga'/ /gang zhig 'jug dang mi 'jug ma rtogs pa/ /des ni 'dod pa dag la zhen pa skyed/ /de bzhin gshegs pas de ni rab mkhyen pas/ /de slad 'dod pa dag

la zhen mi mnga'/ /zhe sdang gti mug khong khro 'chab pa dang / /g.yo sgyu phrag dog nga rgyal khengs pa dang / sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod dang brtson 'grus dang / /bsam gtan shes rab dag kyang de bzhin no/ /de nas
bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa'i sems kyi rtog pa thugs kyis mkhyen nas 'dzum pa mdzad de/ 'od zer gser gyi kha dog lta bu rab tu bkye'o/ /'od zer des kyang sangs rgyas
kyi zhing tshad med dpag tu med pa rnams snang bar byas te/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag tu phan pa dag byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
gtsug tor nyid du thim par gyur to/ /de nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' byams pa 'dug pa'i stan las langs nas/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la
btsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas te/ gus pas thal mo sbyar nas/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod de/ bcom ldan 'das la zhu ba zhus pa/

'brug dang seng ge'i sgra sgrogs shing / /ka la ping ka'i sgra phyung bas/ /chos rnga chen po'i sgra 'byin pa/ /ci yi slad du 'dzum pa mdzad/ /nyi ma stong bas khyad par 'phags/ /rnam par sgra rab dag dang ldan/ /
yon tan ngo mtshar rab mnga' ba/ /ci slad 'od zer bkye ba mdzad/ /sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod brtson 'grus/ /bsam gtan shes rab rab brgyan pas/ /thams cad dag ni yongs rdzogs
pas/ /ci slad 'od zer bkye ba mdzad/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dbyangs mnyen pas/ /ngag rtsub rnams ni rtag tu spangs/ /sems can nad ni legs gso ba/ /ci slad 'od zer bkye bar mdzad/ /
thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis gtso/ /mig ni rtag tu stong dben mkhyen/ /rnam dag tshangs pa'i dbyangs mnga' bas/ /sems can rnams la chos ston mdzad/ /rna ba sna lce lus dang yid/ /sgra dang ming
la sogs pa nas/ /kun 'byung 'gog pa lam dag dang / /ye shes bzod pa'i bar de bzhin/ /thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis gtso/ /mig zad skye ba'i mtha' dag dang / /rab zhi dag ni 'khor ba dag /
thams cad stong dben nyid du mkhyen/ /rna ba sna lce lus dang yid/ /gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya nas/ /sgra dang ming la sogs pa'i bar/ /thams cad kyang ni de bzhin no/ /gzhan yang rten cing 'brel
'byung chos/ /chad dang rtag pa yongs bral nas/ /bdag dang gzhan gyis byas min pas/ /rkyen med las byung nyid du gsung / /res 'ga' rnam grangs sna tshogs kyis/ /sdug bsngal gzhi ni ston par
mdzad/ /res 'ga' don ni sna tshogs kyis/ /sangs rgyas 'od zer bsngags par mdzad/ /res 'ga' tshig ni tshad med kyis/ /rab dben chos ni ston mdzad cing / /gang zag srog dang bdag med dang /
sems can med pa nyid du ston/ /'das pa'i sangs rgyas tshad med kyang / /bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag gis/ /tshigs su bcad pa brgya stong gis/ /de 'dra'i chos ni ston par mdzad/ /de bzhin gshegs pas
yon tan chos/ /yang dag nyid ni ston mdzad kyang / /rjod dang brjod bya mi mnga' bas/ /brjod mdzad chos kyang yong mi mnga'/ /bcom ldan yang dag chos srung zhing / /skye dgu rnams
ni go mdzad pas/ /lha rnams dang ni gnod sbyin dag /gang thos de dag rtogs par 'gyur/ /lha ma yin ni thams cad kyang / /mos pa dag ni rnam par dag /mi ni mang po tshad med kyang / /the
tshom dra ba chad par gyur/ /'dod chags rang bzhin rab tu rtogs/ /zhe sdang gti mug rnam par bshig /sred dang nga rgyal ma rig dang / /g.yo sgyu phrag dog spros pa nas/ /sdug bsngal phung po la sogs
par/ /thams cad kyang ni yongs su spangs/ /'di la sogs pa'i tshig gi don/ /mthar ni kun kyang rnam par dag /de bzhin gshegs pas chos gcig la/ /sna tshogs ming ni rab mkhyen pas/ /grangs ni brgya

stong mang po rnams/ /bsam gyis mi khyab rab tu ston/ /sangs rgyas tshad med mang po las/ /de 'dra'i chos ni legs bslabs pas/ /chos kyi dngos po gcig la yang / /brjod pa thug pa med pa ston/ /de bzhin
gshegs pas chos rnams kyi/ /rnam grangs sna tshogs rab mkhyen pas/ /ming tshig dang po bar ma dang / /tha ma rnam 'byed rab tu mkhyen/ /tha dad tshig ni sna tshogs dag /thams cad rab tu bslabs
pas na/ /don mchog dag ni gya nom pa/ /ston pa dag ni rab tu mkhyen/ /de 'dra'i dbyangs ni rnam dag pa/ /rgyu rkyen tshogs pa las byung bas/ /lce 'ba' zhig la rten pa nas/ /lus sems par la
rten pa'ang min/ /sa ni rnam pa drug tu g.yos/ /phyogs bcu'i 'khor ni yongs 'dus nas/ /thal sbyar bcom ldan zhal lta na/ /the tshom dag ni bsal du gsol/ /de bzhin gshegs pas mi bzad dang / /
skye mtha' dag ni rang bzhin gyis/ /rtag tu stong zhing dben pa dang / /'gro 'ong med par rab tu mkhyen/ /bzhugs dang gnas ni mi mnga' bas/ /yang dag mtha' la rab tu bzhugs/ /bcom ldan spyan

ni thogs mi mnga'/ /de slad deng bdag zhu ba lags/ /de bzhin gshegs pas mig nyid kyi/ /sngon dang phyi ma'i mtha' dag dang / /zad dang ma zad 'khor ba ni/ /rang bzhin stong dben rab mkhyen pas/ /chos kyi

don rnams rab phye nas/ /'jig rten rnams ni dga' bar mdzad/ /thub pa dbyangs snyan rab mnga' bas/ /ci slad 'dzum pa stan par mdzad/ /bcom ldan sngon dang phyi mtha' dang / /mig nyid stong dben rab mkhyen
cing / /rnam rtog tshig dang bral lags na/ /ci slad 'dzum pa ston par mdzad/ /bcom ldan mig ni dpag med dang / /brjod pa sna tshogs rang bzhin gyis/ /rtag tu stong dben mkhyen lags na/ /ci slad 'dzum
pa ston par mdzad/ /bcom ldan zad dang skye mtha' dang / /mig nyid stong dben rab mkhyen cing / /nyon mongs rnams ni yongs spangs pas/ /sangs rgyas byang chub mkhyen pa brnyes/ /grags pa
mchog ni phun sum tshogs/ /ci slad 'dzum pa ston par mdzad/ /bcom ldan yun ring bsgom bslabs pas/ /bsam gyis mi khyab ston par mdzad/ /mig nyid stong pa nyid du mkhyen/ /dri bral rtag
tu rnam par dag /sems kyi spyod pa tshad med rnams/ /dgongs pa gcig gis thams cad mkhyen/ /'od zer 'jig rten snang mdzad pa/ /'di ni gang gi snga rtags lags/ /drang srong chen po mngon sangs
rgyas/ /rkang gnyis gtso bo khyad par 'phags/ /nyon mongs dag ni rab bsal bas/ /thugs ni rtag tu zhi zhing dben/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen mchog gis/ /mig zad mtha' ni rab tu rtogs/ /

rgyu dang rkyen ni gang ni slad/ /deng 'dir 'dzum pa ston par mdzad/ /rna ba sna lce lus dang yid/ /yul drug dang ni 'byung chen bzhi/ /sgra dang ming la sogs pa'i bar/ /thams cad kyang ni de bzhin no/ /
bcom ldan mig la bdag med mkhyen/ /rna ba mi rtag nyid du rtogs/ /sna nyid stong par rab mkhyen na/ /ci slad 'dzum pa ston par mdzad/ /bcom ldan lce la bdag med mkhyen/ /lus kyang mi rtag nyid
du rtogs/ /sems yid stong par rab mkhyen na/ /ci slad 'dzum pa ston par mdzad/ /bcom ldan gzugs la bdag med mkhyen/ /sgra yang mi rtag nyid du rtog /dri nyid stong par rab mkhyen na/ /
ci slad 'dzum pa ston par mdzad/ /bcom ldan ro la bdag med mkhyen/ /reg bya mi rtag nyid du rtogs/ /chos nyid stong par rab mkhyen na/ /ci slad 'dzum pa ston par mdzad/ /bcom ldan sa la bdag med
mkhyen/ /chu yang mi rtag nyid du rtogs/ /me nyid stong par rab mkhyen na/ /ci slad 'dzum pa ston par mdzad/ /bcom ldan rlung la bdag med mkhyen/ /ngo bo mi rtag nyid du rtogs/ /dngos nyid stong par
rab mkhyen na/ /ci slad 'dzum pa ston par mdzad/ /bcom ldan 'jig rten bdag med mkhyen/ /sdug bsngal mi rtag nyid du rtogs/ /phung po stong par rab mkhyen na/ /ci slad 'dzum pa ston par mdzad/ /
bcom ldan khams la bdag med mkhyen/ /'jig rten mi rtag nyid du rtogs/ /skye nyid stong par rab mkhyen na/ /ci slad 'dzum pa ston par mdzad/ /bcom ldan sgra la bdag med mkhyen/ /ming yang mi
rtag nyid du rtogs/ /lam nyid stong par rab mkhyen na/ /ci slad 'dzum pa ston par mdzad/ /bcom ldan ye shes bdag med mkhyen/ /rab dben mi rtag nyid du rtogs/ /sems can stong par rab mkhyen na/ /
ci slad 'dzum pa ston par mdzad/ /bcom ldan rang bzhin rang bzhin med/ /bdag dang bdag med pa yang mkhyen/ /mos pa stong par rab mkhyen na/ /ci slad 'dzum pa ston par mdzad/ /'khor ba
bdag med nyid du gzigs/ /rtag dang mi rtag pa yang mkhyen/ /mya ngan 'das pa stong mkhyen na/ /ci slad 'dzum pa ston par mdzad/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thugs rnam grol/ /grags pa khams
gsum kun du gang / /brgya byin mi yi dbang po dang / /klu rnams la sogs kun gyis mchod/ /de bzhin gshegs pas mig zad dang / /skye mtha' rab dben mkhyen lags na/ /ci slad 'dzum pa
ston par mdzad/ /sangs rgyas sras ni tshad med pa/ /'khor 'dir thams cad rab tu 'dus/ /sangs rgyas gsung las skyes pa dang / /chos las sprul te gang byung ba/ /thams cad bcom ldan spyan
sngar mchis/ /gus pas thal mo rab sbyar lags/ /'khor 'dus de dag slad du ni/ /'od zer rgyu rkyen 'di zhu lags/ /de bzhin gshegs pas mig nyid ni/ /stong zhing bdag med mkhyen pas na/ /khyim na
gnas pa'i rnal 'byor pa/ /thams cad las ni yang dag 'das/ /de bzhin gshegs pas chos rnams ni/ /bye brag med cing mnyam mkhyen pas/ /bcom ldan dgongs pa rab mkhyen gyi/ /rdzu 'phrul
dag gis gzigs ma lags/ /bcom ldan mig la bdag med mkhyen/ /ngo bo nyid stong 'gro 'ong med/ /rnam dag mkhyen pa tshad ma mchis/ /ci slad 'dzum pa ston par mdzad// // bam po gsum pa//
de bzhin gshegs pa skye mtha' rab zad pa/ /thugs rje chen pos 'jig rten kun skyob mdzad/ /chos rje mchog gyur mi yi gtsor gyur pa/ /ci slad 'dzum pa stan mdzad bshad du gsol/ /byang chub sems
dpa' chen po tshad ma mchis/ /gzhan yang lha tshogs gzi byin che ba rnams/ /mkha' la gdugs ni dam pa dag kyang thogs/ /sa chen 'di ni rab tu g.yos par gyur/ /gang zhig sngon
ni de bzhin gshegs pa las/ /yun ring dge ba'i chos ni gang bsgrubs pa/ /mnyam par dga' mdzad thugs rje chen po'i gtso/ /ci slad 'dzum pa bstan mdzad bshad du gsol/ /
gang zhig sngon ni sangs rgyas rab mchod nas/ /chos 'di thos nas dga' ba rab skyes pas/ /'dren pa rab mchog mi yi gtsor gyur pa/ /ci slad 'dzum pa bstan mdzad bshad du gsol/ /bcom ldan

gsung ni mang po dga' mdzad pas/ /bya rgyal dad pa shin du dbyangs rab snyan/ /sgra snyan tshad med rang gi ngang gis 'byung / /ci slad 'od zer 'di bkye bshad du gsol/ /tshigs bcad bye ba tshad ma mchis
pa yis/ /rjes 'thun gsung gi bsngags pa brjod gyur cing / /ku tsi ra yi sgra skad mchog ldan pa/ /ci slad 'od zer bkye ba bshad du gsol/ /'brug sgra zab mos chos ni bstan pa'i sgra/ /'jig

rten brgya stong dpag med grags gyur pa/ /thugs rjes tshig rtsub yang na 'jam ston pa/ /ci slad 'od zer gser gyi kha dog bkye/ /skye dang mi skye zad dang mi zad mkhyen/ /mig nyid bral zhing 'gro 'ong med

par rtogs/ /'jig rten snang mdzad bdud rtsi'i mchog gyur pa/ /ci slad 'od zer gser gyi kha dog bkye/ /mig gi byung ba rtag tu stong dben dang / /'gro 'ong ma mchis gnas pa ma mchis dang / /smig rgyu chu bur lta

bur rab mkhyen pa/ /rgyu rkyen gang gi slad du 'dzum bstan lags/ /de bzhin rna ba sna lce lus dang yid/ /gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya chos rnams nas/ /sgra dang ming la sogs pa'i bar du yang / /thams cad de

bzhin du ni rig par bgyi/ /rdo rje rtag pa'i sku dang mi 'jig sku/ /mtshan mchog brgya stong dag ni phun sum tshogs/ /sku la 'khrul 'khor mi mnga' g.yo mdzad pa/ /rgyu rkyen gang slad 'dzum pa bshad du gsol/ /

byin pa zlum zhing zhabs kyi rting pa ring / /phyal gyi mtshan ma mi gda' seng ge 'dra/ /lte ba shin du zab cing rked rgyas pa/ /rgyu rkyen gang slad 'dzum mdzad bshad du gsol/ /gser sku rnam dag rdul dang dri ma spangs/ /

ba spu re re kha dog mthon mthing ldan/ /g.yas su 'khyil cing spos kyi ngad ldang ba/ /rgyu rkyen gang slad 'dzum mdzad bshad du gsol/ /sku mchog dam pa yongs rdzogs rtag gnas pa/ /dper na n+ya gro d+ha yi shing rgyal
bzhin/ /yon tan thams cad kyis ni rab tu brgyan/ /gsung dbyangs dag gis 'khor ni dga' bar mdzad/ /dpung pa zlum zhing phrag pa stug la mdzes/ /gtsug tor yongs rdzogs g.yas su 'khyil bar gda'/ /
zhing ni brgya stong dpag med rgyu bar mdzad/ /sems can log dang yang dag lam ston mdzad/ /tshems dkar dri mi mnga' bas dung dang 'dra/ /ljags mtshan srid rid zhal ni kun du khebs/ /'gram pa seng ge

'dra zhing shangs ni mtho/ /thams cad thabs dang rnam dag thugs las skyes/ /ud pa la yi bsung ni zhal nas 'byung / /tsan dan dri dag sku ni kun du khyab/ /sngon ni byams pa rgya cher bsgoms pas na/ /rnam
dag mos pa rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad/ /de bzhin gshegs pas zhabs mthil shin du mnyam/ /sa la reg kyang rdul ni gos mi 'gyur/ /gom pa seng ge glang po che 'dra bas/ /'jig rten thams cad la ni yang dag
'das/ /'khor lo rtsibs stong mtshan gyis mdzes par brgyan/ /khyad 'phags 'od zer dag ni rab tu gsal/ /dge ba dag gis skye dgu phan 'dogs pas/ /gang gis mthong ba dang ba rab tu skye/ /sor gcig
'od zer brgya stong rab bkye nas/ /sangs rgyas zhing ni dpag med snang bar mdzad/ /sngon ni dge sbyong mang po rab bsgrubs pas/ /mtshan gyi bkod pa sna tshogs 'di brnyes lags/ /gzugs sku yongs
rdzogs dpe zla yong ma mchis/ /zhal mtshan rab mdzes shin du khyad par 'phags/ /rdzu 'phrul dag gis 'jig rten phan 'dogs pa/ /ci slad 'dzum pa bstan mdzad bshad du gsol/ /byin pa ri dgas e na ya dang

'dra/ /sku dbyibs mi rgu seng ge ji lta bzhin/ /'jig rten byung nas 'jig rten snang mdzad pa/ /ci slad 'dzum pa bstan mdzad bshad du gsol/ /cang shes bzhin du mtshan sbas rdul mi mnga'/ /phyag mthil mnyam rgyas

phyag ni pus mo 'das/ /mi yi seng ge ngo mtshar khyad par 'phags/ /ci slad 'dzum pa bstan mdzad bshad du gsol/ /sku las 'od zer dpag med rab 'gyed cing / /kha dog gya nom rab zhi rtag gsal ba/ /rnam dag

thugs ni rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad/ /mdo sde tshad med pa dag ston par mdzad/ /rtag dang chad pa dag la gnas pa yis/ /de 'dra'i chos ni sgrub par 'gyur ma lags/ /gang gis mthar lta rnams ni rab spangs na/ /bcom

ldan rnam dag sku ni myur thob 'gyur/ /lha rnga 'brug sgra gsung ni kun grags shing / /ka lan 'da' ka'i dbyangs snyan rab tu gsal/ /lha yi glu sgra brgya stong mang ldan pa/ /ci slad 'od zer bkye ba bshad du gsol/ /
'dren pas gsung gcig tu ni chos bstan pas/ /'chal ba'i tshul khrims can dag rgyun yang bcad/ /de bzhin gshegs pas dbyangs rab gang gsungs pa/ /de kun zab cing ngo mtshar chos lags so/ /khyu mchog
smin mtshams 'od zer rab bkye bas/ /sangs rgyas zhing ni brgya stong gsal bar mdzad/ /spyan mchog dag ni kha dog mthon mthing 'dra/ /gtsug tor mtshan ni mkha' yi lhas mi mthong / /tshems dkar gtams
pa bzhi bcu dag dang ldan/ /dper na rin chen chu shel dag dang mtshungs/ /dge ba'i phrin las tshad med dag las skyes/ /ci slad 'dzum pa bstan mdzad bshad du gsol/ /de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan

rdzogs pa'i sku/ /kha dog dam pa dpag med phun tshogs shing / /'od zer rnam dag ngo mtshar rab bkye ba/ /ci slad 'dzum pa bstan mdzad bshad du gsol/ /thugs rje chen po mchog rgyal rkang gnyis gtso/ /sems
can yang dag bsam pa thugs su chud/ /thogs pa ma mchis spobs pa mchog brnyes pa/ /ci slad 'dzum pa bstan mdzad bshad du gsol/ /de bzhin gshegs pas pha rol rab byon pas/ /rig pa gsum dang mngon shes

drug phun tshogs/ /rnam dag 'od zer dpag med ston mdzad pa/ /ci slad 'dzum pa bstan mdzad bshad du gsol/ /bcom ldan sngon ni bskal pa dpag med snyed/ /bcom ldan brgya stong snyed 'i mchod pa mdzad/ /de 'dra'i
rgyu 'bras chab ni mi 'tshal ba/ /ci slad 'dzum pa bstan mdzad bshad du gsol/ /bcom ldan sngon ni bskal pa dpag med snyed/ /ting 'dzin mchog rnams la ni rab bzhugs pas/ /mig gi skye mtha' zad pa'i

mtha' mkhyen na/ /ci slad 'dzum pa bstan mdzad bshad du gsol/ /'das pa dang ni ma 'ongs da ltar dus/ /'dren pas de dag kun ni rab tu mkhyen/ /rnam dag mkhyen pa thogs med bsam mi khyab/ /ci slad 'dzum pa bstan

mdzad bshad du gsol/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor mang po'i mdun du phyag gser gyi kha dog lta bu brkyang ste/ zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa'i spyi bo la bzhag nas tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ gzhon

nu shin du legs par nyon/ /ngas ni deng 'dir byang chub chos/ /'od zer rab tu ston pa'i mdo/ /khyod la shin du yongs gtad kyis/ /ma 'ongs tha ma dus ngan tshe/ /chos ni rnam par 'jig pa na/ /khyod kyis sems can
rnams la ni/ /rab tu phyi nas bshad par gyis/ /ngas ni sangs rgyas spyan dag gis/ /ma 'ongs tha ma dus kyi tshe/ /shin du zab cing gya nom pa'i/ /mdo sde dam pa 'di dag la/ /gang mos gang ni mi mos

pa/ /thams cad kun kyang gzigs shing mkhyen/ /sems can dag ni gang zhig gis/ /byang chub lam ni rab tshol ba/ /rtag tu sangs rgyas rjes dran zhing / /mdo sde 'di ni gzung bar gyis/ /gang zhig dad pa rab

'jig cing / /'du 'dzi la ni mos 'gyur dang / /nyin mtshan gnyid la gang dga' ba/ /mdo sde 'di la mos mi 'gyur/ /nga yi bstan pa dag las ni/ /rab tu byung bar gyur nas kyang / /mya ngan 'das pa'i chos dag
la/ /mos pa dag ni mi skye ba/ /skyes bu blun po de dag ni/ /dad pas byin pa chud gzon 'gyur/ /'dus byas rnams kyi chos dag la/ /nyes dmigs mang bar thos kyang ni/ /'jig rten dag la mngon zhen nas/ /

'jigs pa dag ni mi skye ba/ /skyes bu blun po de dag ni/ /mkhas pa rnams kyis smod par 'gyur/ /chos gos dag ni bgos gyur kyang / /de la shes rab ci yang med/ /thub pas legs par gsungs pa yi/ /yang dag
bka' ni gang yin pa/ /shes pa med pas thos gyur na/ /yid ches len par mi 'gyur te/ /skyes bu blun po de dag dang / /lhan cig gnas par mi bya'o/ /khyad par 'phags pa'i chos 'di dag /gal te thos par

gyur nas kyang / /rab tu dga' zhing mos pa yi/ /sems kyang skye bar mi 'gyur pa/ /de 'dra'i gang zag dag la ni/ /das ni rab tu smod par byed/ /mi lus thob par gyur mod kyang / /de ni don med chud zos yin/ gal

te shin du zab pa'i chos/ /'di dag thos par gyur nas ni/ /rab tu dga' zhing mos pa yi/ /sems ni rab tu skye 'gyur pa/ /de 'dra'i gang zag de dag ni/ /sngon chad sangs rgyas phrad pas na/ /gdon mi za ba

kho nar ni/ /bla med byang chub thob par 'gyur/ /skyes bu blun po gang dag cig /lta ba ngan pas rab smas nas/ /shes rab srog ni gcod byed pa/ /byang chub yongs su spong bar 'gyur/ /de lta bas na mi dge ba'i/ /

bshes gnyen dag ni rab spangs nas/ /blo ldan mkhas pa dag la ni/ /bsten cing gus pa bskyed par bya/ /'jig rten dag ni thams cad na/ /nyes dmigs tshad med gang yod dang / /sems can ngan song gsum por ni/ /

rtag tu bying bar gang byed pa/ /thams cad gti mug rmongs pa yi/ /rgyu dang rkyen las byung bas na/ /nyon mongs rjes su 'jug byed cing / /rang dbang dag ni 'thob mi 'gyur/ /yang dag chos ni spong byed cing / /chos ma

yin pa spyod par byed/ /de lta bas na rmongs pa yi/ /skyes bu dman pa spang bar bya/ /ji ltar kha lo sgyur pa yis/ /rang gi srog shing bcag pa bzhin/ /mi dge las ni byas pas na/ /sems can dmyal bar skye

bar 'gyur/ /kha nas tshig ngan phyung nas ni/ /rtag tu bdag la gnod byed pa/ /ji ltar sta re rno thogs nas/ /rang gi lus ni gcod byed 'dra/ /chos rnams rgyu dang rkyen dag gis/ /byas pa'i las kyi rjes su ni/ /

rnam smin myong ba skyabs med par/ /de ltar khong du ma chud pas/ /'jig rten drang srong la bsten nas/ /dge ba'i grogs po yin snyam sems/ /de nas rang nyid 'di snyam du/ /stong pa nyid ni gang bsgom pa/ /

'dus ma byas ni rtogs snyam nas/ /chad par lta ba skyed par byed/ /lus ni snod chag pa dang 'dra/ /sems kyang rjes su 'gag gyur zhes/ /phal cher kyal ba'i tshig dag la/ /mos pa nyid du rab 'gyur zhing / /

'di la mngon par zhen pas na/ /phan pa'i don ni ci yang med/ /gal te sbrul ni gdug pa yis/ /gnod pa dag ni rab byas kyang / /nam yang skye dgu mang po rnams/ /ngan 'gro dag tu ltung mi byed/ /blun po gang
zhig chos ston pa/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba 'jig byed pas/ /skye dgu mang po tshad med snyed/ /sems can dmyal bar ltung bar byed/ /khyed la sogs pa 'khor 'dus pa/ /'di lta bur ni lta bar gyis/ /deng

'dir nga yi spyan sngar ni/ /zla 'od gzhon nu gang 'dug pa/ /'dis ni sngon chad 'das pa yi/ /sangs rgyas dag ni bcom ldan 'das/ /tshad med gang gA'i klung bye snyed/ /mchod pa rim gro rab byas shing / /
shin du bstan par yongs bsgoms nas/ /bla med ye shes btsal bas na/ /srid pa dag ni thams cad la/ /sems kyis gnas pa ci yang med/ /mig gi skye mtha' gtan du ni/ /rnam par dag par shes pas

na/ /spros pa dag ni yongs spangs nas/ /mngon par zhen pa ci yang med/ /sems can dag ni tshad med la/ /phan pa dag ni bya ba'i phyir/ /bla med 'od zer ston pa yi/ /mdo sde dag ni ston par byed/ /skyes
bu blun po gang yin pa/ /chos 'di slob par mi nus pas/ /rnal 'byor bsgom pa dag la ni/ /skyon nyid du yang lta bar byed/ /de lta bas na blun po dag /thag ring por ni yongs spangs nas/ /de dag la ni

bsten mi bya/ /de yi chos kyang mi bslab bo/ /skyes bu blun po gang yin pa/ /rtsod pa'i smra la mos pas na/ /rtsod smra med pa'i spyod pa la/ /nan tan bsgrub par mi nus pas/ /skyes bu de dag rnams la ni/ /
tshul bzhin sems ni ci yang med/ /de lta bas na de dag la/ /bsnyen bkur mi bya bsngags mi brjod/ /skyes bu blun po gang yin pa/ /le lo snyoms las la gnas pas/ /rtag tu lus dang ngag yid kyi/ /
mi dge las ni spyod pas na/ /de la tshul khrims dag pa dang / /shes rab mang thos ci yang med/ /rtag tu 'dod pa'i yul sems shing / /'du 'dzi dag la mos par byed/ /khyed kyis 'di ltar blun po de/ /
rigs dang rus dang lus kyang ni/ /dman pa yin par rab tu ltos/ /khong khro bka' blo mi bde zhing / /byad bzhin dag ni mi sdug la/ /gang te dge ba'i gnas skyes kyang / /lus ni rtag tu ma rabs 'gyur/ /

bdag tu 'du shes la zhen pas/ /yang dag don la rmongs par 'gyur/ /blo gros dag dang mi ldan pas/ /tshig gi bye brag 'byed mi nus/ /rang bzhin stong pa'i chos thos kyang / /de la mos pa skyed mi 'gyur/ /
de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das/ /yun ring po nas 'jig rten pa'i/ /tshig gi spros pa gang yin pa/ /thams cad rab tu spangs pa yin/ /so so'i skye bos 'di dag la/ /shin du zhen cing chags

pas na/ /ji srid 'tsho ba'i bar du yang / /rtogs shing khong du chud mi 'gyur/ /tshul khrims bsngags pa rjod byed kyang / /tshangs par spyod pa sgrub mi byed/ /kha nas chos ni ston byed kyang / /lus kyis chos min
spyod par byed/ /rang gis 'dul ba ston byed kyang / /rtag tu 'dul min spyod par byed/ /sangs rgyas slob ma dag la ni/ /kha dog sgyur ba'i gos gyon gsungs/ /'chal ba'i tshul khrims can dag gis/ /gos

'di rab tu bgos gyur kyang / /nga rgyal dang ni bag med pa'i/ /sems ni rab tu 'phel bar byed/ /dad pas byin pa ci zos pa/ /thu lum 'bar ba med pa 'dra/ /de ltar khyim gyi gnas spangs nas/ /'dod pa lnga yi
bde ba'ang med/ /gzhan yang sangs rgyas chos dag la/ /mchog gi bde ba ma thob nas/ /spyod pa 'dren ma mos byed pas/ /mtha' gnyis dag ni spong mi 'gyur/ /yid kyi mos pa ji snyed pa/ /thams cad kyang

ni dag mi 'gyur/ /de 'dra'i gang zag blun po ni/ /'khor mang nang du gnas gyur kyang / /dper na ji ltar wa skyes dag /seng ge'i khyur ni zhugs pa bzhin/ /de ltar rab tu zhi ba yi/ /chos ni yang dag bstan

byas kyang / /de bzhin nyid dang stong pa'i don/ /rtogs shing khong du ma chud pas/ /'khor mang dag la bstan bsngags kyang / /khengs pa'i sems ni skyed par byed/ /ston pa chen po mi dran pas/ /ngo tsha
dman pa'i sems kyang med/ /mi gtsang dngos po len byed kyang / /yid bzhin nor bu thob pa bzhin/ /shin du dga' bas 'dzin byed pas/ /sems kyis chung zad stong mi byed/ /'di lta bu yi ma rabs

dag /khyim nas rab tu byung nas ni/ /spyod lam dag kyang srung ba dang / /chos gos lhung bzed 'dzin byed kyang / /cha byad tsam dang ldan pas na/ /yang dag shes rab ci yang med/ /kha spu dag ni bregs gyur

kyang / sdig pa'i sems ni mi spong zhing / /dge sbyong ma yin pa yi chos/ /log lta dag tu lhung gyur na/ /rab dben mya ngan 'das pa'i lam/ /de dag rab tu nyams par 'gyur/ /dge sbyong sngon du bya ba yi/ /

'bras bu dag kyang 'thob mi 'gyur/ /ma rig nyon mongs rnams kyang ni/ /rdul tsam nyams par mi 'gyur ro/ /grong khyer dag tu rnam rgyu zhing / /rang nyid dben pa'i bsngags brjod kyang / /skyes bu blon po

blo med pas/ /yang dag bgrod pa shes mi 'gyur/ /sems kyi 'dun pa ci yod pa/ /de dag thams cad mi dge yin/ /rnyed pa 'dod pa'i rgyu yi phyir/ /dgon pa dag na gnas byed kyi/ /mya ngan 'das pa'i yang dag

rgyu/ /bsgrub pa'i phyir ni ma yin no/ /rmugs dang gnyid la rab tu dga'/ /lus ni ji ltar bde snyam nas/ /rtag tu de lta'i dngos po dag /sgrub pa la ni mos par byed/ /dgon pa'i gnas ni de dag tu/ /lo ni
mang por gnas byed kyang / /phyin log lta bar gyur pa'i phyir/ /mya ngan 'das lam stong bas na/ /nams kyang dge sbyong lam dag gi/ 'bras bu dag ni thob mi 'gyur/ /yang dag lta ba rab nyams shing / /

tshul khrims dag dang 'gal byas pas/ /gos bzang dag gis lus brgyan pa/ /de la shin du sred par 'gyur/ /'dod pa'i bde ba rnams la ni/ /rtag tu sred pa skyed par byed/ /gal te grong khyer zhugs na yang / /nga rgyal

mtshan ma ston byed cing / /lus kyi las ni mi srung bas/ /spyod lam dag la gnas mi byed/ /res 'ga' grong khyer zhugs nas ni/ /rgyu tshe rang nyid 'di skad du/ /dgon pa'i gnas ni de dag na/ /ri phug dag ni gang yod

pa/ /khyed rnams 'di ltar shes par gyis/ /de ni bdag gi gnas yin te/ /mtho dma' ran par lta ba dang / /'gro gom tshul la gnas so zhes/ /tha dad mtshan ma'i tshig brjod de/ /dgra bcom pa yi rtags bstan pas/ /

khyim pa dag ni ji snyed pa/ /phan tshun du ni 'di skad du/ /dgon pa'i dge slong gang yin pa/ /yang dag 'phags pa yin zhes zer/ /res 'ga' dgon pa de dag na/ /gnas par gyur pa de yi tshe/ /gal te gzhan dag

'ongs gyur na/ /'di lta bur ni ston par byed/ /bdag ni dgon gnas 'di dag tu/ /nyin mtshan 'chag par byed ce 'am/ /yang na rtswa 'jam bting nas ni/ /'dir ni 'dug par byed ces zer/ /res 'ga' grong khyer

zhugs gyur nas/ /khyim pa'i der ni phyin pa'i tshe/ /g.yo sgyus nan tan 'di skad du/ /bde 'am zhes ni 'dri bar byed/ /'jig rten pa yi 'du 'dzi'i gtam/ /rgyal po chos rkun la sogs pa'i/ /sna tshogs dag ni rjod par byed/ /

res 'ga' chags pa'i sems dag gis/ /bud med rnams kyi mdun dag tu/ /thabs ni rnam pa sna tshogs kyis/ /rang gi yon tan rjod par byed/ /bdag ni 'jig rten thams cad kyi/ /bsod nams zhing ni chen po byed/ /

bdag ni rgyal thabs rab spangs nas/ /rab tu byung nas lam sgom yin/ /btsun mo dang ni slas rnams kyang / /mtho ris skyes par gyur ces zer/ /de dag de skad thos nas ni/ /shin du gus pa rab bskyed de/ /gos zas dang ni btung bdag /
sna tshogs sbyar nas mchod par byed/ /btsun pas thugs rjer rab dgongs shing / /bdag cag thad du yang gshegs zer/ /ro zhim dag la zhen chags shing / /nyes dmigs rnams ni mi shes pas/ /bdud kyis

glags kyang rnyed 'gyur te/ /ru sbal rgya mos zin pa 'dra/ /dgon par gnas pa dag la yang / /rnyed pa dag gis snyems par byed/ /dge slong brtson 'grus can dag la/ /brnyas shing skur pa 'debs par byed/ /rnyed dang grags pas

sems rmongs pas/ /yang nas yang du zhen pa skyed/ /lus ni yongs su gso ba'i phyir/ /rtag tu g.yo sgyu spyod pas na/ /lus dang ngag gi mi dge las/ /yang nas yang du 'phel bar byed/ /gal te sbyin dag dad pa yis/ /dang

ba'i sems kyis mchod na yang / /le lo snyoms las dbang gis ni/ /de yi bsod nams 'bri bar byed/ /skyes bu blun po de dag ni/ /rtag tu mi dge 'dod bskyed pas/ /stong pa nyid kyi chos 'di la/ /rjes 'thun bzod sems

'thob mi 'gyur/ /gang dag nga yi bstan pa las/ /nyes dmigs de dag rab spangs nas/ /nan tan bag yod sgrub byed na/ /chos 'di thos par dka' mi 'gyur/ /rnyed pa dang ni mi rnyed dang / /bstod smad sdug bsngal bde la sogs/ /

'jig rten chos kyis mi g.yos pa/ /chos 'di thob par dka' mi 'gyur/ /lus la mi gtsang 'du shes dang / /phung po rma yi 'du shes dang / /zas ni rma bskus 'du shes pa/ /chos 'di thob par dka' mi 'gyur/ /gos bzangs dag ni

thob gyur kyang / /dregs pa dag ni mi skyed cing / /ngo tsha dgab pa'i phyir gyon pa/ /chos 'di thob par dka' mi 'gyur/ /gzugs dang stobs ni mi snyems shing / /zas la chags pa med pa dang / /srog gnas phyir ni gang za ba/ /chos 'di

thob par dka' mi 'gyur/ /sred pa rnams ni stong shes nas/ /'dod pa dag la blang dor med/ /rtag tu stong dben gang spyod pa/ /chos 'di thob par dka' mi 'gyur/ /dpag tshad gcig 'das ri khrod du/ /gcig pu 'dug gnas mnyam bzhag

cing / /'dus byas bdag med gang rtogs pa/ /chos 'di thob par dka' mi 'gyur/ /mi zad skye ba'i mtha' dag dang / mig 'jug mtshan nyid rtogs byed cing / /mig gtsang lam ni rab sgrub pa/ /chos 'di thob par dka' mi

'gyur/ /rna ba sna lce lus dang yid/ /gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya nas/ /sgra dang ming gi bar du yang / /thams cad kun kyang de bzhin no/ /de bzhin ma 'ongs dus kyi tshe/ /dge slong dag ni tshad med snyed/ /brtson pa dang ni le lo can/ /thams

cad de bzhin shes par gyis/ /dge dang mi dge'i grogs po dag /sgrub pa dang ni mi sgrub pa/ /yid ches pa dang yid mi ches/ /thams cad de bzhin shes par gyis/ /dge dang mi dge'i grogs po dag /mig zad lam ni gang yin pa/ /sgrub

pa dang ni mi sgrub pa/ /thams cad de bzhin shes par gyis/ /gang zhig byang chub rab mos shing / /zla gcig gnyis gsum 'das nas ni/ /dus gzhan phyir ni gang ldog pa/ /thams cad de bzhin shes par gyis/ /gang zhig chos 'di

thos gyur nas/ /mos pa'i sems ni gang rnyed pa/ /gal te nyams par gyur na yang / /slar ni dang ba thob par 'gyur/ /gang zhig chos 'di thos gyur nas/ /bag med spong bar mi byed pa/ /mdo 'di sangs rgyas bka' ma yin/ /de snyam du ni

sems par 'gyur/ /gang zhig chos 'di thos gyur nas/ /bdud kyis yongs su gang bzung ba/ /dang po dad pa skyes gyur kyang / /phyis ni rab tu spong bar 'gyur/ /gang zhig chos la ma mos pa/ /mi bden grags dang rnyed pa tshol/ /grong

khyer grong rdal rab rgyu zhing / /gzungs rnams dang ni ting 'dzin dang / /kun 'dzin 'od zer bsngags brjod kyang / /de yis yang dag rtogs mi 'gyur/ /'dod pa lnga pos bcings pa dang / /'jig rten las ni 'dod tshol ba/ /brjod pa

dag ni rtogs byed pas/ /stong nyid sgom la skur pa 'debs/ /dran dang shes rab sems med pas/ /tshe tshad rab tu don med 'das/ /blun po stong pa'i chos spong ba/ /de ni tshul khrims bgegs byas pas/ /mnar med dag tu ltung bar

'gyur/ /nam yang mtho ris yong mi skye/ /gang gis skad cig gcig la ni/ /mchod rten stong ni byas pa bas/ /gang gis mdo sde 'di thos nas/ /tshig bzhi tshigs bcad gcig 'dzin 'phags/ /me tog phreng ba brgya

stong dag /sangs rgyas mchod rten mchod pa bas/ /gang gis mdo sde 'di thos nas/ /tshig bzhi tshigs bcad sems pa 'phags/ /gang gis rin chen mchod rten dag /gang gA'i bye snyed byas pa bas/ /gang gis tha na skad
cig tsam/ /mdo sde 'di sems khyad par 'phags/ /sangs rgyas zhing ni 'bum phrag brgya/ /me tog gtor nas mchod pa bas/ /gang gis tha na skad cig tsam/ /mdo sde 'di sems khyad par 'phags/ /chos gos 'bum

phrag brgya mang po/ /sangs rgyas rnams la phul ba las/ /gang gis tha na skad cig tsam/ /mdo sde 'di sems khyad par 'phags/ /sangs rgyas spyan ni rnam dag 'phags/ /mi mkhyen mi gzigs gang yang med/ /gang gis mdo

sde 'di mos na/ /sangs rgyas spyan ni thob par 'gyur/ /'das pa'i bskal pa grangs med tshe/ /sangs rgyas mar me mdzad pa byung / /nga ni bram ze'i khye 'ur gyur/ /me tog thogs nas mchod pa byas/ /shAg kya thub pa zhes bya ba/ /

byang chub snying po la 'dug nas/ /mdo sde 'di ni ston 'gyur zhes/ /nga la byang chub lung yang bstan/ /khyod ni de tshe gzhon nur gyur/ /nga lung bstan pa thos gyur nas/ /dga' zhing dad pa'i sems bskyed de/ /thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad du/ /

gal te bram ze'i khye'u 'di ni/ /mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas tshe/ /bdag ni de yi grogs gyur nas/ /mya ngan 'das pa'i 'og tu yang / /chos kyi sde snod rab 'dzin cing / /srung bar shog ces smon lam btab/ /sangs rgyas mar me mdzad de yis/ /

'od zer ston pa'i mdo 'di ni/ /ji skad gsungs bzhin de yi tshe/ /bram ze'i khye'u dang gzhon nu gnyis/ /legs par mnyan cing yongs su bzung / /nga sngon 'das pa'i dus kyi tshe/ /me tog ud pa la dag gis/ /sangs rgyas de la mchod pa byas/ /

de tshe khyod kyang der 'dug ste/ /'di skad du ni smon lam btab/ /nga yi bstan pa tha ma la/ /mdo sde 'di ni rab bzung nas/ /rgya cher ston par shog ces smras/ /gang gis chos 'di thos gyur nas/ /zhe sdang sems ni mi skyed

par/ /gzung 'dzin klog cing gang 'don pa/ /de ni skyes bu dam pa yin/ /khyod kyis ma 'ongs dus kyi tshe/ /thos dka'i chos 'di rab bzung nas/ /sems can dag la don gyi tshul/ /rgya cher dbye zhing bstan par bya/ /ngas kyang 'das

pa'i dus kyi tshe/ /yang dag chos ni nub pa na/ /'od zer ston pa'i mdo 'di ni/ /sems can dag la rgya cher bstan/ /blun pos nan tan mi sgrub pas/ /'di la skur ba 'debs par byed/ /ngas ni de skad thos gyur kyang / /zhe sdang

dag ni skyed mi byed/ /ngas ni rtag tu bzod sgoms nas/ /'jig rten rnams la phan 'dogs byed/ /bzod pa'i stobs ni rdzogs pas na/ /mtshan dang dpe byad dag gis brgyan/ /gzhon nu khyod kyis sangs rgyas sku/ /gya nom yongs

su rdzogs gyur cing / /gser gyi kha dog rnam dag 'phags/ /bzod pa'i stobs las byung bar ltos/ /nga yi zhabs ni sa reg nas/ /zhing ni tshad med g.yo byed kyang / /sems can rnams ni mi ltung ba/ /thams cad bzod pa'i stobs

las skyes/ /nga yi spu khung gcig nas ni/ /'od zer brgya stong rab bkye nas/ /thams cad gsal bar gang byed pa/ /thams cad bzod mchog stobs las byung / /srin po bzhin du 'jigs pa'i gzugs/ /srog chags gzi

byin 'phrog byed pa/ /nga la rtag tu gus pa yang / /thams cad bzod mchog stobs las byung / /nga yi 'khor ni ji snyed pa/ /sems ni rab tu dul gyur nas/ /de bzhin gshegs la gus pa yang / /thams cad bzod mchog

stobs las byung / /rol mo'i sgra ni brgya stong dag /'khor 'dus chen po'i nang dag tu/ /sangs rgyas yon tan bsngags brjod pa/ /thams cad bzod mchog stobs las byung / /klu yi rgyal po brgya stong dag /rab tu gdug cing

'jigs rung ba/ /sangs rgyas mthong na dga' ba yang / /thams cad bzod mchog stobs las byung / /srin po gnod sbyin la sogs pas/ /me tog phreng ba brgya stong thogs/ /'ongs nas nga la mchod byed pa/ /thams cad

bzod mchog stobs las byung / /zhing ni brgya stong tshad med par/ /bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams/ /nga yi yon tan bsngags pa yang / /thams cad bzod mchog stobs las byung / /lto 'phye dang ni lus srul po/ /

brgya stong dag ni 'dus gyur nas/ /me tog gtor nas nga mchod pa/ /thams cad bzod mchog stobs las byung / /gnod sbyin rgyal po la sogs pa/ /bye ba brgya phrag drug bcu rnams/ /'ongs nas nga la gang mchod pa/ /

thams cad bzod mchog stobs las byung / /gzhan yang klu yi rgyal po ni/ /ma na pa ga la sogs pas/ /mu tig dmar pos nga mchod pa/ /thams cad bzod mchog stobs las byung / /du mu ru dang shi khyi ba'i/ /brgya stong

snyed ni 'dus gyur nas/ /rol mo dag gis nga mchod pa/ /thams cad bzod mchog stobs las byung / /lto 'phye dang ni lus srul po/ /brgya stong snyed ni 'dus gyur nas/ /me tog spos kyis nga mchod pa/ /thams cad bzod

mchog stobs las byung / /sa chen 'dzin pa klu yi rgyal/ /lus phyed dag ni rab bstan nas/ /thal sbyar nga la gus pa yang / /thams cad bzod mchog stobs las byung / /lus med sgra gcan zin la sogs/ /bye ba phrag ni brgya

stong rnams/ /dang ba'i sems kyis nga mchod pa/ /thams cad bzod mchog stobs las byung / /gzhon nu khyod kyis 'di ltar ltos/ /sangs rgyas 'od zer gang reg pa/ /sdug bsngal bral nas bde thob pa/ /thams cad bzod

mchog stobs las byung / /sa mu ta dang rlung gi lha/ /brgya stong nam mkha' gang bar ni/ /spos kyi char phab nga mchod pa/ /thams cad bzod mchog stobs las byung / lha yi 'khor ni brgya stong dag /lha yi me tog gtor

mchod de/ /sred spangs sangs rgyas sten byed pa/ /thams cad bzod mchog stobs las byung / /khyed kyis sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul dang / /sbyin dang tshul khrims sgra bsgrags nas/ /thams cad kun du thos mdzad pa/ /

bzod mchog stobs las byung bar ltos/ /phung po khams kyi sgra dag dang / /bden pa bzhi yi sgra dag gis/ /thams cad kun ni go mdzad pa/ /thams cad bzod mchog stobs las byung / /nga yi rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis ni/ /

mkha' las mig zad mtha' dag dang / /rab zhi'i sgra ni thos gyur te/ /skye ba'i mtha' yang de bzhin no/ /nga yi rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis ni/ /mkha' las mig ni rgyu dang rkyen/ /de las skye yang 'gro 'ong med/ /de skad du ni thos par 'gyur/ /

nga yi rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis ni/ /mkha' las mig zhi rtogs byed na/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyang de las skyes/ /de skad du ni thos par 'gyur/ /nga yi rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis ni/ /mkha' las mig zad mtha' zhi bas/ /sangs

rgyas rnams ni de las skyes/ /de skad du ni thos par 'gyur/ /nga yi rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis ni/ /mkha' las mig mtha' rab zhi bas/ /sangs rgyas rnams ni de las skyes/ /de skad du ni thos par 'gyur/ /nga yi rdzu

'phrul stobs kyis ni/ /mkha' las mig skye mtha' zhi bas/ /sangs rgyas rnams ni de las skyes/ /de skad du ni thos par 'gyur/ /nga yi rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis ni/ /mkha' las mig 'jug rab zhi na/ /sangs rgyas

rnams ni de las skyes/ /de skad du ni thos par 'gyur/ /nga yi rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis ni/ /mkha' las mig ni skye zhi bas/ /sangs rgyas rnams ni de las skyes/ /de skad du ni thos par 'gyur/ /nga yi rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis ni/ /mkha' las mig

dben rab zhi bas/ /sangs rgyas rnams ni de las skyes/ /de skad du ni thos par 'gyur/ /rna ba sna lce lus dang yid/ /gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya nas/ /sgra dang ming la sogs pa'i bar/ /thams cad kun kyang de bzhin no/ /

'dod sdang gti mug khong khro dang / /'chab dang phrag dog g.yo sgyu dang / /khengs dang nga rgyal la sogs pa/ /rgya cher bshad pa 'ang de bzhin no/ /de nas zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pas de lta bu'i chos khyad par du
'phags pa thos pas rab tu dga' bar gyur nas thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das sang gi gdugs la bdag de bzhin gshegs pa dang / /'khor mang po dang bcas par
gdugs tshod la spyan 'dren na/ thugs brtse bar dgongs te bdag gis sbyar ba'i gdugs tshod gsol bar ci gnang / /de skad ces gsol pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gzhon nu de'i bsam pa rnam par dag

pa dang / sems can tshad med pa rnams la yang phan pa mdzad par 'gyur bar thugs kyis mkhyen nas thugs brtse bar dgongs te cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo / /de nas zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa stan las langs nas/

bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas te/ lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ rab tu dga' bas rang gi khyim du song ste/ rang gi 'khor dang bcas pa dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang /

lto 'phye chen po la sogs pas rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po'i bzhi mdor dar gyi lding khang bres te lding khang de yang shin du mtho zhing rgya che la thams cad kun du khyab pa/ gser gyi tsong tsong dra bar bres pa/ /nor

bu rin po che'i phreng ba spyangs pa/ seng ge'i ba dan dang / gser gyi phreng ba lu gu rgyud can 'bum phrag brgya stong sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa/ gzhan yang rin po che'i me tog kha dog khyad par du 'phags pa'i phreng ba'i

phung po dag gcal du bkram mo/ /me tog tsam pa ka dang a ti mug ta la sogs pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyi phreng ba tshad med grangs med pa yang rin po che'i lding khang gi nang thams cad dang / 'khor 'dus pa thams cad kun du

khyab par spyangs shing rgyan du bris so/ /gzhan yang de'i nang du khri stan rnams bshams nas/ rin po che'i spos byi li ka dang / du ma tsa dang / tsan dan dang / gur gum rnam par dag cing yid dga' bar byed pa sna
tshogs bsregs so/ /de bzhin du sbyar spos mchog dam pa sna tshogs kyang mchod pa'i yo byad du sbyar to/ /gzhan yang spos kyi chus lam srang rnams kun du khyab par chag chag btab bo/ /sa bzhi kun

du me tog sna tshogs bcal du bkram mo/ /de'i tshe lha'i bu mo dang / lha ma yin gyi bu mo dang / sgra gcan zin gyi bu mo grangs med tshad med pa yang rab tu dga' ba'i sems bskyed nas/ byang chub kyi rgyu mngon par bsgrub

par 'dod pa'i phyir der 'ongs nas grong khyer chen po khyad par du 'phags pa de rab tu brgyan to/ /de nas zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa grong khyer de kun du khyab par brgyan cing yongs su dag pa dang gdugs tshod la bab par rig
nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das sems can rnams la sman par mdzad pa'i slad du grong khyer chen por gshegs su gsol/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das 'khor mang po dang thabs

gcig tu grong khyer du gshegs nas sgo'i them pa la zhabs bzhag ma thog tu grong khyer chen po de'i sa chen po yang rab tu g.yos par gyur/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'bum phrag brgya stong tshad med pa yang
rab tu g.yos par gyur te/ de'i tshe long ba dag ni gzugs mthong bar gyur/ sdug bsngal ba rnams ni bde ba thob par gyur/ 'on pa rnams ni sgra thos par gyur/ byad bzhin mi sdug pa rnams ni byad bzhin

bzang po thob par gyur/ /nor med pa rnams ni nor dang ldan par gyur/ bu med pa rnams ni bu yod par gyur/ gos med pa rnams ni gos thob par gyur/ rin po che med pa rnams ni rin po che thob par gyur/ nye bshes

med pa rnams ni nye bshes dang ldan par gyur/ lus kyi rgyan thams cad kyis phongs pa rnams ni lus kyi rgyan thams cad dang ldan par gyur to/ /gzhan yang ngang pa dang / khrung khrung dang / ne tso dang / rma bya dang /

ka ri ka la sogs pa bya'i tshogs mang po rnams de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba dang / rab tu dga' ba'i sems bskyed nas sgra snyan cing yid du 'ong ba mchog dam pa phyung ste/ gang gis sgra de dag thos pa yang

yid shin du bde bar gyur to/ /gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pas rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis tsam pa ka'i ljon shing tshad med pa snyed mngon par sprul pas/ sems can brgya stong mang po rnams me tog yongs su dag

pa de dag dang / gzhan yang spos mchog dam pa thogs nas bcom ldan 'das la mngon par gtor te mchod pa byas so/ /gzhan yang lha ma yin gyi bu mo dbang phyug thob pa brgya stong du ma mu tig dmar po dang / tsan

dan gyi phye ma thogs nas de bzhin gshegs pa la rab tu dga' bas mngon par gtor to/ /lha ma yin mang po dang / gzhan yang lha mang po rnams rin po che'i gdugs gser dang / dngul gyis rab tu brgyan pa thogs nas

bar snang la 'dug ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i steng du khebs par g.yogs so/ /gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis tsan dan gyi ljon shing dang / rin po che'i snod dang / gos la sogs pa'i

ljon shing brgya stong tshad med dpag tu med pa rin po che rnams kyis brgyan pa/ me tog dang / lo ma phun sum tshogs shing rgyas pa/ sems can tshad med pa'i bsod nams kyi rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu thun mong du mngon

par grub pa/ rlung gi ngad langs pa tsam gyis spos mchog dam pa'i dris sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med pa rnams kun du khyab par gang ba mngon par sprul to/ /sems can brgya stong tshad med pa rnams kyis kyang dus
gcig tu me tog thogs nas bcom ldan 'das la mngon par gtor to/ /de bzhin du sems can ma yin pa tshad med pa rnams kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis mngon par sprul pa sha stag go /

gang dag ci dang ci smon pa de dag kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi dbang gis de dag gi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du re ba yongs su rdzogs par gyur to/ /bcom ldan 'das grong khyer du gshegs pa'i tshe 'khor 'dus pa thams cad

nam mkha' la khyad par du 'phags pa'i sgras bsam gyis mi khyab par yang dag par ston pa'i sgra thos par gyur kyang de gang nas byung ba shes par yang ma gyur la tshigs su bcad pa brgya stong du mas kyang chos rnams

yang dag par bstan par gyur to/ /bcom ldan 'das ni grong khyer zhugs pa'i tshe/ /mkha' las sgra ni 'di skad grags par gyur/ /'dod chags zad mtha' stong dben gang rtogs pa/ /yang dag nyid rtogs byang chub thob

par 'gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das ni grong khyer zhugs pa'i tshe/ /mkha' las sgra ni 'di skad grags par gyur/ /'dod chags skye mtha' stong dben gang rtogs pa/ /yang dag nyid rtogs byang chub thob par 'gyur/ /bcom
ldan 'das ni grong khyer zhugs pa'i tshe/ /mkha' las sgra ni 'di skad grags par gyur/ /'dod chags mtha' ni stong dben gang rtogs pa/ /yang dag nyid rtogs byang chub thob par 'gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das ni
grong khyer zhugs pa'i tshe/ /mkha' las sgra ni 'di skad grags par gyur/ /'dod chags rab zhi stong dben gang rtogs pa/ /yang dag nyid rtogs byang chub thob par 'gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das ni grong khyer
zhugs pa'i tshe/ /mkha' las sgra ni 'di skad grags par gyur/ /'dod chags 'jug pa stong dben gang rtogs pa/ /yang dag nyid rtogs byang chub thob par 'gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das ni grong khyer zhugs
pa'i tshe/ /mkha' las sgra ni 'di skad grags par gyur/ /'dod chags med cing stong dben gang rtogs pa/ /yang dag nyid rtogs byang chub thob par 'gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das ni grong khyer zhugs pa'i

tshe/ /mkha' las sgra ni 'di skad grags par gyur/ /'dod chags skye med stong dben gang rtogs pa/ /yang dag nyid rtogs byang chub thob par 'gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das ni grong khyer zhugs pa'i tshe/ /mkha' las sgra

ni 'di skad grags par gyur/ /'dod chags rab 'gog stong dben gang rtogs pa/ /yang dag nyid rtogs byang chub thob par 'gyur/ /zhe sdang gti mug khong khro 'chab ser sna/ /g.yo sgyu khengs dang nga rgyal mya ngan dang /

sdug bsngal kun 'byung 'gog pa lam sems can/ /khye'u dang bu mo bud med dag dang ni/ /skyes bu gso ba dag dang dbang po drug /yul drug 'byung chen bzhi yi dngos po dang / /'jig rten sdug bsngal phung po khams

dag dang / /'jig rten skye sgra ming sogs kyang de bzhin/ /chos rje dam pa'i chos ni bstan pas na/ /sems can thams cad rab tu dga' bar 'gyur/ /lha yi 'jig rten kun kyang thos gyur nas/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i
theg la gnas par mos/ /bcom ldan 'das ni grong khyer zhugs pa'i tshe/ /mkha' las sgra ni 'di skad grags par gyur/ /bcom ldan sbyin stobs dag la rab mos pas/ /sbyin pa'i stobs kyis byang chub
brnyes par gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das ni grong khyer zhugs pa'i tshe/ /mkha' las sgra ni 'di skad grags par gyur/ /bcom ldan tshul khrims rnam dag rab mos pas/ /tshul khrims rnam dag stobs kyis byang chub
brnyes/ /bcom ldan 'das ni grong khyer zhugs pa'i tshe/ /mkha' las sgra ni 'di skad grags par gyur/ /bcom ldan bzod pa dag la rab mos pas/ /bzod pa'i stobs kyis byang chub brnyes par gyur/ /bcom ldan
'das ni grong khyer zhugs pa'i tshe/ /mkha' las sgra ni 'di skad grags par gyur/ /bcom ldan brtson 'grus dag la rab mos pas/ /brtson 'grus stobs kyis byang chub brnyes par gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das
ni grong khyer zhugs pa'i tshe/ /mkha' las sgra ni 'di skad grags par gyur/ /bcom ldan bsam gtan dag la rab mos pas/ /bsam gtan stobs kyis byang chub brnyes par gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das ni
grong khyer zhugs pa'i tshe/ /mkha' las sgra ni 'di skad grags par gyur/ /bcom ldan shes rab dag la rab mos pas/ /shes rab stobs kyis byang chub brnyes par gyur/ /rdzu 'phrul mngon shes yon tan

gnas shes stobs/ /thabs dang gzungs kyi stobs dang grags pa'i stobs/ /las dang rten 'byung yan lag dad dang thos/ /stong dang 'thun pa'i stobs dang rab zhi stobs/ /rab dul yang dag mtha' dang dben mkhas
stobs/ /'jigs dang dga' dang phan 'dogs la mos dang / /byams dang snying rje dga' snyoms bzod 'tshe med/ /stong dang mtshan ma med sogs kyang de bzhin/ /stobs bcu 'phags pa'i mnga' bdag lha
yi gtso/ /yon tan grags pa dpe zla ma mchis pa/ /grong khyer mchog gshegs zhabs ni bzhag pa'i tshe/ /sems can rnams la rgya cher phan pa mdzad/ /sngon chad srid gsum las dge rab bsgrubs pas/ /
lha yi dge ba sna tshogs 'phel bar mdzad/ /'jig rten thams cad kyis ni rab tu bkur/ /nga yi bstan pa 'di thos thams cad dga'/ /bcom ldan grong khyer gshegs nas zhabs bzhag tshe/ /grong khyer sa chen
dag ni rab tu g.yos/ /bcom ldan rnam dag 'od zer mthong bas na/ /ngo mtshar mi 'dzin mi dga' gang yang med/ /bcom ldan grong gshegs phan pa cher mdzad pas/ /lha mi'i 'khor rnams sems ni dga'
bar 'gyur/ /sa dang mkha' 'gro dag gis srid gsum na/ /bcom ldan shin du bde zhes bsngags par gyur/ /bcom ldan zhabs kyi 'khor lo sa bzhag tshe/ /rnam dag 'od zer kun gsal

ngo mtshar gyur/ /rta ni cang shes grong khyer sgra snyan phyung / /bya tshogs dag kyang mkha' las rab tu dga'/ /gzhan yang rab dang bud med mang po yi/ /lag dang rkang dang gdub 'khor phreng ba dang / /de bzhin rin
chen rgyan ni sna tshogs las/ /ma dkrol pa yang rang las sgra snyan byung / /so sor phan tshun dga' ba'i gtam brjod cing / /skad mang bkra shis mchog gis bsngags pa brjod/ /'on long dbang po ma
tshang dbang po thob/ /thams cad bcom ldan khyad 'phags 'bras bu dbang / /bcom ldan grong khyer gshegs tshe kun dga' bas/ /lha mis me tog mngon par mchod pa byas/ /mkha' las kun du sgra

snyan byung bas na/ /lha tshogs tshad med rab tu dga' bar gyur/ /gzhan yang sems can dran pa nyams pa dag /smyos 'khrugs rab zhi phan tshun gtam snyan brjod/ /bud med gang sbrum mya ngan 'jigs gyur pa/ /'od zer

byin gyis bde ba thobs par gyur/ /skyes pa bud med ngo tsha khrel bcas la/ /dri ma spangs pa'i chos dag rab bshad pas/ /thams cad dga' nas dag pa'i sems bskyed de/ /thub mchog zhabs la spyi btud phyag
byas nas/ /kha cig bcom ldan bla med lam rab tshol/ /kha cig byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos tshol/ /bcom ldan grong khyer mchog tu gshegs pas na/ /bcom ldan zhal du lta zhing rang nyid dga'/ /bcom
ldan mkhyen pas sa yi spyod rtogs pas/ /'jig rten rjes mthun phan pa rab tu mdzad/ /chos kyi nor mchog byang chub sems dpa' byin/ /rin chen mchog ni sems can rnams la btang / /bcom ldan grong

khyer gshegs pa'i tshe/ /mkha' las sgra ni 'di skad byung / /gang zhig mig zad mtha' sred pa/ /sangs rgyas la ni gus pa yin/ /bcom ldan grong khyer gshegs pa'i tshe/ /mkha' las sgra ni 'di skad byung / /

gang zhig mig skye mtha' sred pa/ /sangs rgyas la ni gus pa yin/ /gang zhig mig zad mtha' sred pa/ /sangs rgyas yid ches mi 'jigs 'thob/ /mig zad mtha' ni lta bas na/ /shin du dad pa rgyun mi 'chad/ /
gang zhig mig zad mtha' sred pa/ /chos la yid ches mi 'jigs 'thob/ /mig zad mthar ni lta bas na/ /shin du dang ba rgyun mi 'chad/ /gang zhig mig zad mtha' sred pa/ /dge 'dun yid ches mi 'jigs

'thob/ /mig zad mtha' ni lta bas na/ /shin du dang ba rgyun mi 'chad/ /gang zhig mig zad mtha' sred pa/ /tshul khrims 'dzin med thob par 'gyur/ /mig zad mthar ni lta bas na/ /shin du dang ba rgyun mi 'chad/ /

gang zhig mig zad mtha' sred pa/ /ngan 'gro'i 'dod chags spong bar 'gyur/ /mig zad mthar ni lta bas na/ /'dod chags rgyun ni spong bar byed/ /gang zhig mig zad mthar sred pa/ /ngan 'gro'i zhe sdang spong

bar 'gyur/ /mig zad mthar ni lta bas na/ /zhe sdang rgyun ni spong bar byed/ /gang zhig mig zad mthar sred pa/ /ngan 'gro'i gti mug spong bar 'gyur/ /mig zad mthar ni lta bas na/ /gti mug rgyun ni spong bar
byed/ /gang zhig mig zad mthar sred pa/ /byang chub ye shes dag la gnas/ /mig zad mthar ni lta bas na/ /byang chub ye shes rgyun mi 'chad/ /mig skye mtha' dang mig gi mtha'/ /'jug pa dang ni rab

dben dang / /yod pa nyid du mi 'gyur dang / /mi skye rab tu zhi ba dang / /'di la sogs pa'i sgo rnams kyang / /thams cad mig zad 'dra bar bstan/ /gang zhig mig zad mthar sred pa/ /de ni rtag tu the tshom med/ /

de ltar the tshom med pa'i phyir/ /sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul thob par 'gyur/ /gang zhig mig skye mtha' sred pa/ /de ni rtag tu the tshom med/ /de ltar the tshom med pa'i phyir/ /sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul 'thob

par 'gyur/ /gang zhig mig gi mtha' srid pa/ /de ni rtag tu the tshom med/ /de ltar the tshom med pa'i phyir/ /sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul 'thob par 'gyur/ /gang zhig mig gi 'jug sred pa/ /de ni rtag tu the tshom med/ /

de ltar the tshom med pa'i phyir/ /sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul 'thob par 'gyur/ /gang zhig mi dben rab sred pa/ /de ni rtag tu the tshom med/ /de ltar the tshom med pa'i phyir/ /sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul 'thob
par 'gyur/ /gang zhig mig mi skye sred pa/ /de ni rtag tu the tshom med/ /de ltar the tshom med pa'i phyir/ /sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul 'thob par 'gyur/ /gang zhig mig med la sred pa/ /de ni rtag
tu the tshom med/ /de ltar the tshom med pa'i phyir/ /sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul 'thob par 'gyur/ /gang zhig mig zhi la sred pa/ /de ni rtag tu the tshom med/ /de ltar the tshom med pa'i phyir/ /
sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul 'thob par 'gyur/ /rna ba sna lce lus dang yid/ /gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya nas/ /sgra dang ming gi bar du yang / /thams cad de bzhin sbyar bar bya/ /mig skye dpag
med gang skyed pa/ /ye shes dpag med skyed par byed/ /ye shes dpag tu med pa'i phyir/ /chos 'di bstan pa 'ang de bzhin no/ /mig zad dpag med gang shes pa/ /mig la sgrib pa med par

'gyur/ /de ltar sgrib pa med pa'i phyir/ /sangs rgyas mkhyen pa thogs med 'thob/ /rna ba sna lce lus dang yid/ /gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya nas/ /sgra dang ming gi bar du yang / /thams cad de bzhin sbyar bar bya/ /bcom
ldan grong khyer gshegs pa'i tshe/ /sems can dag ni brgya stong snyed/ /mkha' las chos bshad sgra thos pas/ /sangs rgyas yon tan the tshom med/ /kha cig 'dod chags sems byung yang / /sangs rgyas
ye shes 'jigs mi byed/ /gang zhig 'dod chags sems byung yang / /sangs rgyas yon tan stor ma gyur/ /kha cig 'dod chags sems byung yang / /bla med ye shes tshol byed cing / /ma 'dres chos ni
bsgrub pa dang / /nyan thos theg pa mos mi byed/ /byis pa bsam gtan sgom byed kyang / /bsam gtan bde la mos pas na/ /mngon pa'i nga rgyal rab bskyed nas/ /dge sbyong 'bras bu thob snyam sems/ /

byis pa bsam gtan sgom byed kyang / /mi zad mtha' yi shes med na/ /bskal pa brgya stong sgom byed kyang / /de la rnam grol ci yang med/ /skye ba len pa thams cad ni/ /de la zhen chags skyed par byed/ /
gal te skye nyid stong rig na/ /mthong ba rnams ni rnam dag 'gyur/ /gang zhig bsam gtan bzhi bsgrubs kyang / /mig zad mtha' shes med gyur na/ /bskal pa brgya stong lon yang ni/ /bsam gtan yongs

su dag mi 'gyur/ /gang zhig nyer bsngogs thob gyur kyang / /zad mtha' shes pa 'thob mi 'gyur/ /zad pa thos pa ma shes phyir/ /zag pa thob la rtag tu spyod/ /gang zhig 'du shes zhen byed pa/ /'du shes zad mtha'i shes

pa med/ /'du shes zad pa ma shes phyir/ /rtag tu 'du shes zag la spyod/ /gang zhig 'jig rten zhen chags pa/ /'jig rten zad mtha' shes pa med/ /'jig rten zad mtha' ma shes phyir/ /rtag tu 'jig rten zag la

spyod/ /gang zhig zag bcas sems la gnas/ /sems zad mtha' yi shes pa med/ /sems zad pa ni ma shes phyir/ /rtag tu sems ni zag la spyod/ /gang zhig zag bcas chos la gnas/ /chos zad mtha' yi shes pa med/ /

chos zad pa ni ma shes phyir/ /rtag tu zag bcas chos la spyod/ /sbyangs pa'i chos la gnas gyur kyang / /mig zad mtha' yi shes med na/ /mig zad pa ni ma shes phyir/ /yang dag sbyangs la gnas pa min/ /kha dog sgyur

ba'i gos bgos kyang / /mig zad mtha' yi shes med na/ /mig zad pa ni ma shes phyir/ /yang dag chos gos bgos ma yin/ /ya rabs rigs su skyes gyur kyang / /mig zad mtha' yi shes med na/ /mig zad pa ni ma shes phyir/ /

de ni dag pa'i rigs ma yin/ /'khor mang dag ni bdog gyur kyang / /mig zad mtha' yi shes med na/ /myur du ngan 'gror ltung 'gyur te/ /'khor dag gis ni skyob mi nus/ /sgra yi rig pa mkhas gyur kyang / /mig zad mtha' yi shes

med na/ /mig zad pa ni ma shes phyir/ /sgra yi rig pa rtogs ma yin/ /bzo rnams la ni mkhas gyur kyang / /mig zad mtha' yi shes med na/ /mig zad pa ni ma shes phyir/ /de ni bzo la mkhas ma yin/ /'dri ba mang la

mkhas gyur cing / /yi ge gcig gis rnam 'byed kyang / /mig zad mtha' yi shes med na/ /de ni don 'thun bshad ma yin/ /mkhas pa'i rjes su slob byed kyang / /gsang dang gsang min mi shes shing / /mig zad mtha'

yi shes med na/ /chos 'di rtogs par mi 'gyur ro/ /rjod pa sna tshogs rgyang pan dang / /chos rnams rab tu shes gyur kyang / /mig zad mtha' yi shes med na/ /'khri shing stug por lhung ba 'dra/ /sgra yi rig pa mkhas gyur cing / /

dge dang mi dge'i rtags ston dang / /tshig 'bru yi ge sgra skad dang / /klog dang 'don pa'i mthar thug kyang / /mig zad mtha' ni ma shes na/ /de dag rnams ni shes med yin/ /bud med dag gi mtshan ma dang / /tshig mkhan

rmongs par byed pa dang / /lus mnyes ngal sos chos rnams dang / /mkhyud dpyad dag la mkhas gyur kyang / /mig zad mtha' ni ma shes na/ /de dag rnams ni shes med yin/ /gzhung lugs brgya mang ston byed cing / /yi ge 'bru gcig

mi brjed kyang / /mig zad mtha' ni ma shes na/ /bshad pa de ni don med yin/ /de bzhin mig skye mtha' dag dang / /mig mtha' dang ni 'jug pa nas/ /rab tu zhi ba'i bar du yang / /de bzhin du ni rig par gyis/ /rna ba sna lce lus dang

yid/ /gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya nas/ /sgra dang ming gi bar du yang / /thams cad de bzhin sbyar bar bya/ sgra yi rig pa klog 'don cing / /de yi don ni rtogs gyur kyang / /mig zad mtha' ni ma shes na/ /de ni nam yang dman pa yin/ /smrang

bzhi dag ni 'don byed cing / /gsang sngags dag ni rtogs gyur kyang / /mig zad mtha' ni ma shes na/ /de ni nam yang dman pa yin/ /de bzhin mig skye mtha' dag dang / /mig gi mtha' dang 'jug pa nas/ /rab tu zhi ba'i bar du

yang / /de bzhin du ni rig par gyis/ /rna ba sna lce lus dang yid/ /gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya nas/ /sgra dang ming gi bar du yang / /thams cad de bzhin sbyar bar bya// // bam po bzhi pa/ bcom ldan grong khyer

gshegs pa'i tshe/ /sems can dag ni tshad med snyed/ /mkha' las chos bstan sgra thos pas/ /mig zad mtha' yi shes pa thob/ /bcom ldan grong khyer gshegs pa'i tshe/ /sems can dag ni tshad med snyed/ /mkha' las

chos bstan sgra thos pas/ /mig mi rang bzhin rtogs par gyur/ /stong dang bdag med rab rtogs pas/ /thams cad rnam dag mig thob 'gyur/ /rna ba sna lce lus dang yid/ /gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya nas/ /sgra dang ming gi

bar du yang / /thams cad de bzhin sbyar bar bya/ /'dod sdang gti mug khong khro dang / /nga rgyal khengs dang g.yo sgyu nas/ /bag med pa yi bar du yang / /de bzhin du ni rig par gyis/ /bcom ldan grong khyer gshegs pa'i tshe/ /

sems can dag ni tshad med snyed/ /steng gi nam mkha' dag las ni/ /sangs rgyas mtshan ni sna tshogs thos/ /kha cig 'dod chags 'jigs pa yi/ /dpe zla med pa ming yang thos/ /kha cig zhe sdang 'jigs byed cing / /'jig rten
phan 'dogs ming dag thos/ /kha cig gti mug rab rtogs shing / /nga rgyal 'dul ba'i ming dag thos/ /kha cig 'jig rten dag la ni/ /rab zhi ston pa'i 'dren ming thos/ /kha cig shes rab dag bstan nas/ /

'jig rten phan 'dogs ming dag thos/ /kha cig thabs dag rab bstan nas/ /sems can phan 'dogs ming dag thos/ /kha cig bdud ni rab btul kyang / /'khon 'dzin med pa'i ming dag thos/ /kha cig gsung rab chos dag gis/ /

rnam grol bstan pa'i ming dag thos/ /kha cig sems can sdug bsngal ba/ /rgya cher sgrol ba'i ming dag thos/ /kha cig mi yi gtso bo yis/ /'jig rten sgrol ba'i ming dag thos/ /ming ni de dag thos gyur na/ /thams cad

rnam dag mig thob gyur/ /nam mkha' dang ni rgya mtsho'i chu/ /ri rab lhun po'i bar du yang / /thams cad gzhal du rung srid kyi/ /sangs rgyas mkhyen pa thub mi 'gyur/ /gang zhig mi bzad nges pa thob gyur na/ /chos sku

mngon par 'grub pa dka' mi 'gyur/ /gang zhig chos sku mchog ni grub gyur na/ /kun 'dzin ye shes dpag med thob par 'gyur/ /gang zhig kun 'dzin ye shes dpag med thob/ /des ni mdo sde dpag med go bar 'gyur/ /

gang zhig mdo sde dpag med go gyur pas/ /sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul 'thob pa dka' mi 'gyur/ /gang zhig mig skye nges pa thob gyur na/ /chos sku mngon par 'grub pa dka' mi 'gyur/ /gang zhig chos sku mchog ni grub gyur na/ /

kun 'dzin ye shes dpag med 'thob par 'gyur/ /gang zhig kun 'dzin ye shes dpag med thob/ /des ni mdo sde dpag med go bar 'gyur/ /gang zhig mdo sde dpag med go gyur bas/ /sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul thob pa dka' mi

'gyur/ /de bzhin rna ba sna lce lus dang yid/ /gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya chos dag nas/ /sgra rnams dang ni ming gi bar du yang / /thams cad de bzhin du ni sbyar bar bya/ /de tshe sa chen dag ni rab tu g.yos/ /rgya mtsho ri rnams kyang ni de bzhin no/ /lha ma yin dang lha ni mang

po rnams/ /thams cad rab tu dga' ba skyes par gyur/ /bdud dang bdud dpung g.yo sgyu rab bcom nas/ /thams cad sangs rgyas bkod pa bsgrub par mos/ /lha rnams so sor gzhal med khang zhugs nas/ /phan tshun dga' ba'i gtam ni 'di skad smras/ /

'dren pa deng ni 'jig rten byung bas na/ /lha mi thams cad la ni phan pa mdzad/ /sa bla'i lha 'khor gzhal med khang gnas nas/ /dang ba'i sems kyis dga' nas 'di skad du/ /'dren pa 'jig rten deng byung shin du legs/ /'jig rten kun bde rgyu ni rab tu mdzad/ /

mkha' la spyod pa'i lha rnams de thos nas/ /thams cad dga' nas rab tu dang ba skyes/ /khyad 'phags sgra snyan sangs rgyas bsngags brjod nas/ /'dren pa byung bas 'jig rten phan mdzad zer/ /rgyal chen rigs bzhi'i lha rnams de thos nas/ /thams cad dga' nas

shin du dang ba skyes/ /khyad 'phags sgra snyan sangs rgyas bsngags brjod nas/ /'dren pa byung bas 'jig rten phan mdzad zer/ /sum bcu rtsa gsum lhas ni de thos nas/ /thams cad dga' nas shin du dang ba skyes/ /khyad 'phags sgra snyan sangs rgyas bsngags

brjod nas/ /'dren pa byung bas 'jig rten phan mdzad zer/ /'thab bral lha dag de skad thos nas ni/ /thams cad dga' nas shin du dang ba skyes/ /khyad 'phags sgra snyan sangs rgyas bsngags brjod nas/ /'dren pa byung nas 'jig rten phan mdzad zer/ /

bdag cag byang chub sems ni rab bskyed nas/ /bcom ldan bla med mkhyen pa nye bar bgyi/ /lha mi'i gtso mchog la ni brten nas su/ /sems can thams cad sgrol bar bgyid ces zer/ /dga' ldan lha rnams de skad thos nas kyang / /thams cad

dga' nas shin du dang ba skyes/ /khyad 'phags sgra snyan sangs rgyas bsngags brjod nas/ /'dren pa byung bas 'jig rten phan mdzad zer/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bskal pa bye bar ni/ /spyod mchog khyad 'phags

med mngon bsgrubs nas ni/ /sems can sdug bsngal ba la bde lam bstan/ /'khor ba bsgral nas mya ngan 'das la bkod/ /'phrul dga'i lha rnams de skad thos nas ni/ /thams cad dga' nas shin du dang ba skyes/ /khyad 'phags

sgra snyan sangs rgyas bsngags brjod nas/ /'dren pa byung bas 'jig rten phan mdzad zer/ /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed lhas ni de thos nas/ /thams cad dga' nas shin du dang ba skyes/ /khyad 'phags sgra snyan sangs rgyas bsngags brjod nas/ /

'dren pa byung nas 'jig rten phan mdzad zer/ /de bzhin gshegs pa skye shi 'das pas na/ /bdud dang mu stegs mang po pham par mdzad/ /bla med byang chub dag ni yongs rdzogs nas/ /skye dgu drangs nas pha rol 'jog ces zer/ /tshangs ris

lha rnams de skad thos nas kyang / /thams cad dga' nas shin du dang ba skyes/ /khyad 'phags sgra snyan sangs rgyas bsngags brjod nas/ /'dren pa byung bas 'jig rten phan mdzad zer/ /de bzhin gcig nas gcig tu sgra thos pas/ /

tshangs pa'i 'khor rnams dga' nas 'di skad du/ /'dren pa byung bas 'jig rten phan pa mdzad/ /bdud dpung 'jigs skrag mya ngan byed ces zer/ /srid pa'i rtse mo'i lha yi bar du yang / /sangs rgyas byung nas 'jig rten phan mdzad thos/ /

de bzhin sgra ni kun du grags pas na/ /lha ma yin dag 'gribs shing lha rnams 'phel/ /bdud kyi khang pa dag ni yongs stongs shing / /lha rnams 'khor ni rab tu rgyas par gyur/ /mi 'jigs stobs kyis log pa rab btul nas/ /

byang chub chen po mchog ni myur du brnyes/ /de bzhin skad cig yud tsam lha rnams kyis/ /bcom ldan byung nas phan mdzad thos gyur nas/ /'jig rten 'dren par mdzad pa shin du legs/ /rnam dag mig ni sems can sbyin zhes

zer/ /bcom ldan grong khyer gshegs pa'i tshe/ /'dod pas yongs su gdungs pa rnams/ /mi gtsang bsgom pa bshad thos pas/ /'dod chags zhi ste ma lus spangs/ /bcom ldan grong khyer gshegs pa'i tshe/ /zhe sdang dag gis gdungs

ba rnams/ /byams pa bstan pa'i chos thos pas/ /zhe sdang zhi ste ma lus spangs/ /bcom ldan grong khyer gshegs pa'i tshe/ /gti mug dag gi gdungs pa rnams/ /shes rab chos ni bstan thos pas/ /gti mug zhi ste ma lus spangs/ /

bcom ldan grong khyer gshegs pa'i tshe/ /nga rgyal dag gis gdungs pa rnams/ /nga rgyal spangs pa'i chos thos pas/ /nga rgyal zhi ste ma lus spangs/ /bcom ldan grong khyer gshegs pa'i tshe/ /phrag dog dag gis gdungs pa rnams/ /phrag

dog spangs pa'i chos thos pas/ /phrag dog zhi ste ma lus spangs/ /bcom ldan grong khyer gshegs pa'i tshe/ /khong khro dag gis gdungs pa rnams/ /khong khro spangs pa'i chos thos pas/ /khong khro zhi ste ma lus spangs/ /bcom ldan grong

khyer gshegs pa'i tshe/ /ser sna dag gis gdungs pa rnams/ /ser sna spangs pa'i chos thos pas/ /ser sna zhi ste ma lus spangs/ /gang zhig dul ba'i spyod grub pa/ /dpag med chos ni 'di thos pas/ /mang du thos pa'i

mtshor zhugs nas/ /kun 'dzin sgo ni sgrub par byed/ /gzhan yang mkha' las sgra thos pas/ /me tog dag gis sangs rgyas mchod/ /yon tan khyad par 'phags sgrub cing / /snying rje chen po'i rdzu 'phrul ston/ /gzhan yang

mkha' las sgra thos pas/ /bcom ldan sku dang skye gnas dang / /gdud rgyud dang ni gsung sgra rnams/ /khyad par 'phags pa'i bsngags pa brjod/ /sems can 'gro ba ji lta bar/ /rdzu 'phrul dag kyang ci rigs bshad/ /mig dang rna ba

sna lce lus/ /gzugs dang sgra la sogs pa dang / /bskum pa dang ni bkyang ba bdag /ston par mdzad pa khyad par 'phags/ /bcom ldan 'jig rten 'das pas na/ /'jig rten sgron ma rab mdzad cing / /gzugs ni mang po ston pa yang / /

thams cad sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul yin/ /snod dang snod min de rjes su/ /mi mthun chos ni ston mdzad pas/ /sems can tshe rabs tshad med nas/ /sangs rgyas mchod pa ma byas shing / /dmu rgod gdul bar dka' ba la/ /sems can

dmyal bar bshad pas mdzad/ /gang zhig las lam rmongs gyur cing / /lta la brten nas spros dga' ba/ bcom ldan de dag lta ba dang / spros pa zhi ba'i sgra thos mdzad/ /gzhan yang mkha' las ngo bo nyid/ /nges pa nyid du stong ba dang / /'gro 'ong med

cing mtshan med dang / /ci yang med pa'i sgra yang thos/ /gzhan yang sems can brgya stong dag /mkha' las sha dang shes rab spyan/ /de bzhin chos kyi spyan par du/ /yang dag ston pa'i sgra yang thos/ /bcom ldan rdzu 'phrul stobs

kyis ni/ /tshul khrims ting 'dzin shes rab sgra/ /rnam grol rnam grol mthong ba'i sgra/ /ston pa dag kyang thos par gyur/ /sems can dag ni ji snyed la/ /ji bzhin rdzu 'phrul rab bstan nas/ /ji ltar rjes 'thun sgra skad kyis/ /yang dag chos

ni bstan par mdzad/ /sems can la la gang zhig ni/ /sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod bsgrub mos/ /rdzu 'phrul mos pa ji lta bzhin/ /sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod sgra ston/ /bcom ldan rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis ni/ /sems can dbang

po ji lta bzhin/ /rgya cher yang dag 'byed mdzad pas/ /len 'dzin ston la dgod par mdzad/ /bcom ldan rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis ni/ /phung po khams dang skye mched kyi/ /bcings dang grol dang nye ring dang / /sa yi gnas skabs bye brag gi/ /mtshan

nyid ston pa thos par gyur/ /gzhan yang sa dang ye shes kyi/ /'od zer tshad med ston pa dang / /nyon mongs bag chags spangs pa dang / /spangs min ston pa thos par gyur/ /bcom ldan rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis ni/ /lha dang mi yi ngo bo nyid/ /las dang

'bras bu mi mtshungs mi/ /skye len tha dad thos par gyur/ /res 'ga' bud med mdun dag tu/ /bud med brgyan pa'i lus sprul nas/ /mkha' las skyo ston sgra bsgrags pas/ /gang thos 'dod chags sel bar mdzad/ /shA ri'i bu ni ji lta bzhin/ /shin tu dang

ba skyes gyur pa/ /thugs rjes mos pa ji bzhin du/ /bla med chos ni ston par mdzad/ /maud gal bu dang 'od srung dang / /ka pi na dang kun dga' dang / /'od srung chen po dag dang ni/ /kun shes kaudin+ya la sogs/ /de dag mos pa ji bzhin du/ /nyan thos chos ston thos

par gyur/ /lha rnams dang ni lha ma yin/ /gnod sbyin dag ni mang po dang / /be ro ka ni 'khor bcas dang / /grul bum dag ni tshad med rnams/ /bcom ldan rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis ni/ /gzungs sngags sgra ni thos par gyur/ /i di si/ bi di si/ ir su

i ra/ au na si/ /ma ni si/ u khyi/ a no khyi/ A khi tsa la mang naM ye/ nga ra ni sh+tha ni mi/ ta ka ni/ e mi man tra/ ni ha ra/ a bu re/ b+hUd d+he/ ni re/ a khi tsha ra/ bi ya ki ri ya te/ a khi tshar bar mI te/ ka lA ba hi ni/ sarbo bid shi nir d+he paun/ pa ra shas da te/ sha sA ta/ b+ha ra sha sad ta/

ta ra sad ta/ b+hU mi/ A ma b+ha ra/ li la b+han/ shi tsi tsid ta/ bi ba ma ti/ tsid ta a nan ta/ o be ra ha ba mI ta b+hU mi/ na nam kA ni/ a ka ni bi b+hi mid ta/ sha ri be sh+tha/ a ma la ni ma lA/ bU li te na ra shi tsa/ ha ha ri/ ma ma lI/ b+ha ra ni tish+tha/ tsak+Shu ni ha ra/ U d+ha ri ta pa tsi/ An

ta ri/ ke tu su ke tu su pa ri ni/ ka ri ni/ su su ma ni yai/ ka ka ri/ ka khA ri/ u pa la mU ri/ tish+tha da ri na/ na ga nir ha re/ par b+had te/ A te pa ra ya te/ An ta ra b+han d+he/ An ta ra ta b+ha ti shi tsa/ ha sI ri ma kha lI/ I ni sam b+ha re/ tish+tha sit+ta ra ni/

ku b+hu lo tsa te/ gzhan yang rgyal po rnam thos bu/ /yul 'khor srung ni la sogs pas/ /khyad 'phags sgra ni grangs med kyis/ /bden pa'i sngags tshigs rab tu smras/ /tshad med sgra ni de dag kyang / /bde gshegs rdzu 'phrul dbang gis byung / /

rdzu 'phrul dag ni tshad med pas/ /bstan pa dag kyang tshad med pas/ /res 'ga' sangs rgyas med zhing du/ /rdzu 'phrul rol pa'i stobs dag gis/ /'khor bskor sangs rgyas sku ston pa/ /da ltar mthong ba ji bzhin no/ /bsam gyis mi khyab

zhing dag tu/ /sprul pa tshad med ston mdzad pas/ /bltam nas gom pa bdun gshegs dang / /rgyal srid spangs nas rab byung dang / /byang chub snying por sangs rgyas nas/ /brnyes pa'i chos dag rab dgongs te/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor mdzad dang / /

mya ngan 'das pa ston par mdzad/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi ni stobs dag gis/ /sna tshogs chos ni ston mdzad pas/ /sems can dag ni tshad med rnams/ /khyad 'phags ye shes grub par mdzad/ /de tshe thugs rje chen po yin/ /tshangs pa'i 'khor gyis

yongs bskor nas/ /byams chos bsgom pa bshad bstan pas/ /byams pa'i sems ni 'phel bar mdzad/ /de tshe thugs rje chen po yis/ /lha rnams kyis ni yongs bskor nas/ /bsdu ba'i dngos bzhi bstan mdzad pas/ /bsdu ba'i

spyod bzhi 'phel bar mdzad/ /de tshe thugs rje chen po yis/ /klu rnams kyis ni yongs bskor nas/ /zhe sdang nyes dmigs bshad bstan pas/ /zhe sdang sems ni spangs par gyur/ /de tshe thugs rje chen po yis/ /gnod

sbyin rnams kyis yongs bskor nas/ /rnam 'tshe nyes dmigs bshad bstan pas/ /rnam 'tshe sems ni spangs bar gyur/ /de tshe thugs rje chen po yis/ /lha ma yin gyis yongs bskor nas/ /'thab pa'i nyes dmigs bshad
bstan te/ bzod pa bsgoms pa'i bsngags pa brjod/ /de tshe thugs rje chen po yis/ /nam mkha' lding gis yongs bskor nas/ /'gal byas nyes dmigs bshad bstan te/ /'dum pa'i sems kyis bsngags pa mdzad/ /

de tshe thugs rje chen po yis/ /dri za'i 'khor gyis yongs bskor nas/ /dga' ba'i tshig ni dpag med kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsngags brjod bstan/ /de tshe thugs rje chen po yis/ lto 'phye 'khor gyis yongs bskor nas/ /

mu stegs chos la smod mdzad cing / /bcom ldan gsung rab bsngags brjod bstan/ /de tshe thugs rje chen po yis/ /'dre srin 'khor gyis yongs bskor nas/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan mchog /rgya cher bsngags pa bstan par

mdzad/ /thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan pas/ /sems can dag ni brgya stong snyed/ /mi bzad mtha' bstan thos pas na/ /mthar phyin don ni rtogs par gyur/ /thugs rje chen po 'phrul bstan pas/ /sems can dag ni brgya stong snyed/ /mig skye

mtha' ni bstan thos pas/ /mthar phyin don ni rtogs par gyur/ /thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan pas/ /sems can dag ni brgya stong snyed/ /mig gi mtha' ni bstan thos pas/ /mthar phyin don ni rtogs par gyur/ /thugs rje chen pos

'phrul bstan pas/ /sems can dag ni brgya stong snyed/ /mig 'jug bstan pa thos gyur nas/ /mthar phyin don ni rtogs par gyur/ /thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan pas/ /sems can dag ni brgya stong snyed/ /mig dben bstan pa thos pas na/ /

mthar phyin don ni rtogs par gyur/ /thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan pas/ /sems can dag ni brgya stong snyed/ /mig la skye med bstan thos pas/ /mthar phyin don ni rtogs par gyur/ /thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan pas/ /sems

can dag ni brgya stong snyed/ /mig med bstan pa thos pas na/ /mthar phyin don ni rtogs par gyur/ /thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan pas/ /sems can dag ni brgya stong snyed/ /mig ni nyer zhi bstan thos pas/ /mthar phyin don ni rtogs par gyur/ /thugs rje

chen pos 'phrul bstan pas/ /sems can dag ni brgya stong snyed/ /mig la bdag med bstan thos pas/ /mthar phyin don ni rtogs par gyur/ /thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan pas/ /sems can dag ni brgya stong snyed/ /mig la gang zag med thos pas/ /

mthar phyin don ni rtogs par gyur/ /thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan pas/ /sems can dag ni brgya stong snyed/ /mig la sems can med thos pas/ /mthar phyin don ni rtogs par gyur/ /thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan pas/ /sems can dag

ni brgya stong snyed/ /mig la srog med thos pas na/ /mthar phyin don ni rtogs par gyur/ /thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan pas/ /sems can dag ni brgya stong snyed/ /mig la gso ba med thos pas/ /mthar phyin don ni rtogs par gyur/ /

thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan pas/ /sems can rnams la rgya cher ni/ /'jig rten zhen pa rab smad de/ /zhen pa mi skyed nyid du mdzad/ /thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan pas/ /sems can rnams la rgya cher ni/ /'jig

rten rnyed pa rab smad de/ /'dus ma byas kyi bsngags brjod mdzad/ /thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan pas/ /sems can rnams la rgya cher ni/ /zag bcas shes pa rab smad de/ /zag med shes rab bsngags par mdzad/ /

thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan pas/ /sems can rnams la rgya cher ni/ /'jig rten bsam gtan rab smad de/ /'jig rten 'das pa'i ting 'dzin bsngags/ /thugs rje chen po 'phrul bstan pas/ sems can rnams la brgya cher ni/ /zag
bcas tshul khrims rab smad de/ /zag med bslab gnas bsngags par mdzad/ /thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan pas/ /sems can rnams la rgya cher ni/ /sems rgya chung ngu'i skyon brjod de/ /
sems rgya chen po'i yon tan bsngags/ /thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan nas/ /lus kyi tshul khrims sems shes rab/ /zag med rten pa med pa yi/ /bsngags pa dag ni brjod par mdzad/ /thugs rje chen pos
'phrul bstan nas/ /sdug bsngal 'gog pa'i lam bsngags shing / /spros la dga' zhing zhen pa dag /sangs rgyas smad par rab tu bstan/ /thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan nas/ /sems can rnams la

rgya cher ni/ /mi bzad skyon ni rab 'byed cing / /rab zhi mtshan nyid bstan par mdzad/ /rna ba sna lce lus dang yid/ /gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya nas/ /sgra dang ming gis bar du yang / /thams cad de bzhin sbyar bar bya/ /
thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan nas/ /sems can rnams la rgya cher ni/ /dar la bab cing gzhon pa la/ /nyes dmigs dpag med yod par bstan/ /thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan nas/ /sems can rnams
la rgya cher ni/ /cho rigs dag ni snyems pa la/ /nyes dmigs dpag med yod par bstan/ /thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan nas/ /sems can rnams la rgya cher ni/ /longs spyod bag med gyur pa la/ /nyes
dmigs dpag med yod par bstan/ /thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan nas/ /sems can rnams la rgya cher ni/ /rang dbang bag med gyur pa la/ /nyes dmigs dpag med yod par bstan/ /thugs rje chen pos
'phrul bstan nas/ /sems can rnams la rgya cher ni/ /gzugs kyis bag med gyur pa la/ /nyes dmigs dpag med yod par bstan/ /thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan nas/ /sems can rnams la rgya
cher ni/ /bud med bag med gyur pa la/ /nyes dmigs dpag med yod par bstan/ /thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan nas/ /sems can rnams la rgya cher ni/ /gos kyis bag med gyur pa la/ /nyes dmigs
dpag med yod par bstan/ /thug rje chen pos 'phrul bstan nas/ /sems can rnams la rgya cher ni/ /chang gis bag med gyur pa la/ /nyes dmigs dpag med yod par bstan/ /thug rje chen po 'phrul bstan
nas/ /sems can rnams la rgya cher ni/ /rgyal po bag med gyur pa la/ /nyes dmigs dpag med yod par bstan/ /thug rje chen po 'phrul bstan nas/ /sems can rnams la rgya cher ni/ /tshul khrims snyems
par gyur pa la/ /nyes dmigs dpag med yod par bstan/ /thug rje chen po 'phrul bstan nas/ /sems can rnams la rgya cher ni/ /shes rab snyems par gyur pa la/ /nyes dmigs dpag med yod par bstan/ /

de bzhin rtogs dang rdzu 'phrul dang / /bsam gtan mkhas pa'i nga rgyal dang / /nor dang bshad dang rigs dang 'khor/ /rol mo glu dang lce rgyang dang / /grags pa phun tshogs bsngags pa dang / /bkur sti dang ni rnyed pa dang / /

mdzes dang g.yo sgyu nga rgyal dang / /ngo tsha med dang khrel med dang / /khengs dang phun tshogs nga rgyal dang / /bag med 'dod chags de bzhin no/ /thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan nas/ /sems can gang zhig sems
dang yid/ /dman par gyur pa de dag la/ /khyad par 'phags pa'i 'du shes bstan/ /thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan nas/ /sems can gang zhig rab zhum zhing / /rtsol bar mi byed de dag la/ /
brtson 'grul stobs ni ston par mdzad/ /thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan nas/ /sems can gang zhig nor rnams la/ /chags par gyur pa de dag la/ /chog shes chos ni ston par mdzad/ /gzhan yang
spos kyi dri gtsang khang / /me tog dag ni gzhal med khang / /khang pa brtsegs ma mchog sprul nas/ /sprul pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs par bstan/ /gzhan yang lha yi bu mo rnams/ /me tog tsam pa khang pa
na/ /gnas pa'i lus phyed mngon sprul nas/ /me tog phreng thogs mchod byed bstan/ /gzhan yang lha min bu mo dag /me tog ma li khang pa na/ /gnas pa lus phyed bstan sprul nas/ /me tog phreng thogs
mchod byed bstan/ /gzhan yang lha yi bu rnams dag /pad ma sngon po'i khang pa na/ /gnas pa lus phyed bstan sprul nas/ /sangs rgyas yon tan bsngags pa bstan/ /gzhan yang tshangs pa rnams kyi lha/ /
gser gyi gzhal med khang pa na/ /gnas pa lus kun bstan sprul nas/ /sgra snyan sangs rgyas bsngags pa bstan/ /gzhan yang lha yi bu mo dag /sna tshogs rgyan gyis lus brgyan cing / /rgyan

ni phan tshun reg pa las/ /sgra snyan dag ni rab byung nas/ /'dus byas rnams kyi chos dag ni/ /'gyur zhing mi brtan yin na yang / /byis pa mi bden rtog pa yis/ /yang dag ji bzhin mi shes zer/ /rgyan gyi sgra
ni de dag kyang / /lus dang sems las byung ma yin/ /'gro ba med cing 'ong ba med/ /phyogs kyang yod pa ma yin te/ /gzugs dang sems kyi bar du yang / /thams cad de bzhin sbyar bar bya/ /byis pa
rnams ni mi shes pas/ /'di la the tshom skye bar 'gyur/ /rgyan gyi rnams pa de dag las/ /sgra snyan byung ba de yis ni/ /sangs rgyas zhing kun grags pas na/ /sems can tshad med grol bar gyur/ /de lta

bas na khyod rnams kyis/ /'dren pa'i rang byung ye shes dang / /yon tan dpag med sku dag ni/ /sred pa'i spros las 'das pa dang / /rab dben skyon ni med pa dang / /lta bral sems ni rab sbyangs dang / /

mtshan dang dpe byed brgyan pa dang / /sku dang thugs ni dag par ltos/ /khyed kyis bcom ldan grong gshegs tshe/ /gom pa dag ni seng ge 'dra/ /gshegs stabs ngang pa glang chen 'dra/ /sems can re ba bskong
bar mdzad/ /bsod nams khyad 'phags yongs su rdzogs/ /yang dag mtshan gyis rab tu brgyan/ /sems can dag ni thams cad kun/ /lta bas mi ngoms nyid du ltos/ /khyod kyis rkang gnyis gtso
yi mchog /thugs rje chen po lta bas na/ /dngos po chung ngus mchod byas kyang / /yon tan tshad med 'thob mdzad pas/ /sems can dag ni mang po rnams/ /bskal pa brgya stong mang por ni/ /mya ngan
'das pa 'thob par du/ /rnams smin thug pa med par ltos/ /khyed kyis rkang gnyis gtso mchog ni/ /zag med tshul khrims rdzogs pas na/ /sems can dag ni mang po rnams/ /gus pas spyi bos
